Staring at his new body, John couldn't believe what he had become. Something about him now made him look so appealing like those pictures of women he would see in department store magazines--the ones wearing those swimsuits.

"How did they pose like?" He asks himself while thinking in his mind of the magazines he saw. He attempts to replicate some of those poses right in front of the mirror, but eventually he stopped after a few tries.

The current problem for him was why he was here and why does he look like a swimsuit model. Leaving the bathroom, John noticed the door of his hotel room. He heads over and checks if he could get out. Luckily for him the door opened as he pressed the handle. He puts on a pair of open-toed sandles he found lying near the door beforing venturing out.

The hallway when he got outside had the unkempt atmosphere he felt when he was in his room. No one seemed to be in the hallway right now. He looks at the walls to find a directory to where the elevators were; they were on the other side of the hall.

John begins sprinting over to the hallway elevators. While running, he felt like his body was slowing him down; primarily in his chest area. The breasts he had were bouncing with every step he took. Feeling slightly embarrassed, he was able to get to the elevators anyway.

Right on the button layout were two choices that John found helpful. There was a button labeled "Pool Floor" and another one that was labeled "Ground Floor".

Along the way a small tune played in the speakers up above. John waited patiently while holding onto the railing. He felt a little scared since he was doing this by himself.

The elevator shaft opens, allowing him to walk freely on this level. He notices that it must be night from looking out a glass window. He also sees a large open pool outside with the light posts still illuminating the ground. So cool! He thought. He had never seen a pool that big in his entire life. Before John could go and enter this area, he notices a worker locking the entrance outside. The worker notices him (her) and says, "Miss, it's already 11 o'clock and right now the pool is closed. If you want, the pool lounge hot tub and sauna is still open."

He notices the worker unlocking the keys to the door. The worker's face blushed a mild red. Unbeknownst to John, how he approached the worker with his body tempted the worker to follow his wish.

"Only fifteen minutes and no more than that," says the worker. He felt a bit guilty that he allowed a hot, young woman into the pool.

John enters the pool room and he was astonished by how much bigger it was right up close. He walks along the edge and stops after going half-way. "Cannonball!" He shouts as he makes a high jump into the pool. The water felt immediately cold on the surface of his skin, but as he swam around it gradually started to feel warmer.

Being the only person swimming, he understood what it was like to be an adult in the adult swim time. He had an entire pool all to himself. And because he was bigger, he was able to swim further into the deep end. "Yes! He shouts.

After fifteen minutes the worker calls John saying that his time was up. He also says that this will be the only time where he will grant this. John already did what he wanted in the pool, however.

Leaving the pool drenched, he...
111312122211.title: Goes to pool floor

1113121222111.content:
The worker earlier said to John that he could visit the pool lounge at this time. He was interested to see what it looked like. When he was with his family at parties, the hot tubs were off-limits for some reason. Apparently his parents said that they were for "grown ups only" before going into those hot tubs themselves. However John now had the body of a swimsuit model so he thinks he can go to the pool lounge. They did look like adults.

John was still wet from swimming in the large pool but he didn't have a towel he could dry off of. Still he walked to where the worker said the pool lounge was. Stopping by a mirror, he looks at himself. He still found it strange to look like someone with this type of body; yet he felt a little smitten with his appearance. Swimsuit models don't really play in the water, he thought. Normally they would wait at the side and sit.

A sign labeled "Coral Outcove" was above an entranceway covered by blue drapes. This must have been the pool lounge the worker told him about. He pushes the drapes aside where everything was mostly quiet except for a couple talking in the corner while having drinks and a couple of gentlemen having an all-out game of billiards. A woman dressed in a bikini was watching the game unfold. The hot tub and sauna was set aside in a completely different portion of this lounge.

John thought that this place seemed a bit boring, but he chose on staying here for some time before leaving. He felt his throat to be a little parched. Maybe he should get a drink from somewhere. He finds a bar near one of the walls.

"What can I get for you, sweetheart?" Asks the bartender when John approached him. "Drinks are on the house."

Isn't that what dad says to mom? John wondered. He sees the selection of drinks the bar set in stock. Now it was time for him to do something more daring. "Uh," he replies, "Can I have a Coke Zero?"

"Sure thing," says the bartender as he fills a glass full of soda and ice.

Mom never lets me have soda, John thought. I don't know what beer tastes like but it smells weird. He sips some of the Coke Zero and feels a burst of energy going around his body.

He sits on a barstool while he thinks of going to the hot tub and sauna or talk with the other people in the lounge. The ones playing billiards sound interesting.

At the billiards tables the men John first glanced at earlier were still playing thd game. From the looks of it, it was a 1v1 sort of game. He didn't know the basics of playing that game. All he knows of it was from the specials on TV.

"Joanne," John replied. "It is a pleasure to meet you."

That was the best I could do? He asked himself.

"So Joanne, let's say we get out of here and go to the hot tub together. Are you with me on this one?"

John replies

"Sure thing," John replies.

"Alright," says Mildred, "that settles it." She sits up from her chair and directs her eyes to John. "Don't bother telling them where I am. I had enough with their rivalry."

John only took a look at the gentlemen for a few seconds. They were still dedicated into finishing that match. He quietly backs up from his seat to follow Mildred, who was going to the hot tub room.

"We're going into this room," she says when she stopped in front of a room. She pulls out a plastic card from her bikini top. "Veteran stayers get the extra perk of using the private hot tub."

So she has been here before, John thought. The woman slides the card down the locked door. With the turning of the handle, the private hot tub was in use. Right before the hot tub was a towel rack, a mini bar, lounge chairs, and a closet with an open mirror.

Encasing the private room was a glass exterior that had a view of what looks like a city skyline on the distance. There was a beach nearby as well.

"Let me tell you a fun fact, Joanne," Mildred says. "The glass that you see is actually a one-way mirror."

"What?!" John exclaimed. "I can't see it."

"Silly girl. That is because you have to be outside to see the difference. The reason they have it was so that people could skinny dip privately."

"Skinny dip? What's that?"

"No waiting around. I'm heading inside."

John followed Mildred inside the hot tub. Just like when he entered the pool, the water made his skin feel sensitive, but as he slowly got used to it, the water felt quite nice. It was very warm and he could feel the jets of water streaming around his body. He stares up at the clear sky as he relaxed. Across from him, Mildred was sighing in relief. Only the area above her neck was not submerged into the water.

"So what is skinny dipping?" John asks her.

"You never ever heard of the term, huh?" She faces his eyes. "To put it in a similie, it's like bathing in the bathroom, but in a public area."

..., John thought. "There is no way I want to do that. It's too humiliating." He realizes why her body was submerged. "Are you doing it right now?"

With a sigh, Mildred stands up from her seat, revealing in fact she kept her bikini on this entire time. "Joanne, I would only do it if I was alone." She slowly goes back to how she sat.

After a few moments of silence in the hot tub, the two talked with each other in a long conversation.

As he slipped back into his sandals and waited, John pondered for a moment. Was he ever going to get his original body back? Was this going to be the start of a new life for him? Jumping from an average 10-year-old boy to a swimsuit model? The thought concerned him, but he thought back to the store employee. He could hopefully get back there, but what about Mildred? He really wanted to be friends with her, but a grown woman and a young boy like himself having a friendship was just unheard of. His slightly stressful thought process had given him a tight grip on the bikini that started it all but before he could ponder any longer, Mildred was back out of the closet wearing some denim shorts and a black halter top. "So, you wanna go shopping together?" Mildred asked 'Joanne'. "Mall's open 24 hours, though some of the stores might not be." Mall? This could be his chance to get his life back! If it was the mall he was thinking of... Still, he had to take the chance!

"Yeah!" John said with a burst of enthusiasm.

"Great!" Mildred exclaimed, slipping her own sandals back on, "Honestly, I model a lot of outfits but I don't actually go clothes shopping as often as I want to." John was slightly confused by this.

"Can't you just keep the outfits?" John's question made Mildred laugh a little.

"I wish, but unfortunately that's not how it works, Joanne." Mildred and John went back into the lounge, seeing that the men playing billiards were now gone.

"Wonder who won?" John asked.

"Don't really care to be honest," Mildred nonchalantly replied. "I'd much rather go out shopping with a new friend than go on a date with one of those himbos." Himbo? Like, a boy bimbo? John was learning so much from Mildred, though being called a friend reminded him of the complicated scenario Mildred was causing. Maybe Joanne could be his alter ego switching back and forth? But he didn't know if he could switch back, a thought that made John shudder. As they walked to the elevator, Mildred started more conversation.

"My car or yours?" she asked.

"Oh, I don't actually have a car," John explained, to Mildred's visible confusion.

"No car? I honestly cannot imagine living without my car with how often and how far I have to drive," Mildred stated, "how do you live without a car?" Mildred's question had a comical air to it as they got into the elevator and went to ground floor but John was slightly stumped. What was he supposed to say now? 'Oh, yeah, my parents drive me everywhere'? He had to think of something quick.

"Um... I just kinda... don't really go to many places, and I prefer walking," he said, internally wiping sweat off his forehead.

"Yeah, that makes sense. You just here for the pool, then?"

"Yeah, actually," John was so thankful Mildred practically gave him an answer, the rest of the trip outside going by like a breeze as they made more small talk about the hotel on the way, a mention of John's quick dip in the pool from earlier making Mildred a bit jealous.

As soon as they stepped outside John could identify they were in the same city he lived in and breathed a sigh of relief. He even realized he and his family had drove past the hotel before, he just didn't recognize it from the inside. Luckily, this meant they were going to the mall that changed him... if the store was still open. "So here's my car, it's not much but it gets the job done." John's mind couldn't really think of many other words to describe the car, since it was just... a car like most others. It was blue. That's about it. John instinctively went to get into the back as Mildred got into the driver's seat. "Why are you in the back? Who do you think's getting in with us?" John was slightly embarrassed at Mildred's observation as he got back out and into the front passenger seat.

"Just kinda used to it, you know?" John awkwardly laughed. Being in the front like a grown-up wasn't something he'd experienced much before as a kid.

"Yeah, I can relate." Mildred pulled the car keys out of her bra and started the car up, then looked at John's chest. "Honestly, Joanne, I get the feeling you could help me carry a looooot of things with that rack," she pointed out as she put the keys in their warm pocket. "Eh, I'm used to not wearing clothes with pockets, so I keep a lot of things in my bra," Mildred explained, pulling out of the parking lot.

After a bit of driving and listening to the radio, they were finally at the mall. It was practically a victory lap now. Get into the store, get his life back and... pray it went to plan, John shuddered. "Well, here we are!" Mildred announced, as John was anxious but hopeful as they walked in. Was it open? Was it open? Was it open? John's mind had to find out, while Mildred's mind was moreso just on what new clothes she'd find as they walked in through the mall doors.

"Wait here," John said with confidence as Mildred obliged, curious as to what her new friend was running off for, and wished she had her phone to pass some time by absentmindedly scrolling through Twitter or something. John, meanwhile, was excited as he went up the escalators. Sure enough, the store popped into his line of sight, and it was...

“Nah, it’s cool, I’m just joking around,” Mildred reassured ‘Joanne’, “Nothing wrong with showing off some assets, and it really suits you. So is it just the top?”

John thought for a moment, and decided...

John shrugged. "I think this is all I really need," he answered, to Mildred's slight disappointment.

The two women (well, physically women, anyway) immediately made their way to the food court with their shopping bags in hand, since they had gotten absolutely famished!

"So what are you gonna get?" Mildred asked 'Joanne'.

"Hmm..." Mildred said, hand to chin. She was looking at the menu in contemplation. John didn’t really know why she seemed to have trouble with choosing, but really he'd tempted her into getting something. "Salad and a bottle of water," she eventually picked.

Soon enough, their food was paid for and their feminine butts were parked on their chairs to eat, both immediately getting into their respective foods.

"What time is it again?" John asked after swallowing part of his burger.

"It's about..." Mildred looked around to try and see a clock between mouthfuls. "35 minutes past midnight," she said.

"Woah, it's midnight?" John said in surprise. Was he ever up that late before? Mildred chewed and swallowed for a moment before responding, prompting John to do the same.

"Yeah, I think we've got time to visit one, maybe two stores after we're done eating before we should sleep," Mildred said.

"Yeah, I've got to get up at 10 AM," John explained after another bite out of his burger.

"And I've got to keep my sleep schedule in check for my job," Mildred said as she dug into her salad again. John could tell this might lead into another conversation, though he wasn't complaining. Mildred was surprisingly pretty cool and fun to talk to for a grown-up. "I picked the last one, so what store do you want to go to after we’re done eating?" Mildred's question made John look at some of the open stores. He still wanted to feel like he was doing grown-up shopping, but he also wanted to go someplace his still boyish mind was more interested in. Eventually, though, he decided on...

John had the night to himself and his head started buzzing with questions the more he thought about it, so he took the bikini top and entered the number from it into the hotel room phone.

"Customer service, this is Sam, how can I help you?" a voice from the other end said. That was fast!

"Hello, um, I was just calling because I had a few questions?" John said, used to his female voice.

"Yes, I can answer those. What questions do you have?" Sam inquired.

"So if I spend time in one of the clothing bodies, will my regular body still age?" John asked.

"Yes, you can spend as much time as you want in our clothes and you won't have to worry about not aging slower," Sam explained. "However, other things affecting one body in other ways like gaining weight or getting a tattoo will only apply to one body." So he really did have a figure to maintain.

"So do the clothing bodies age too?" John asked.

"Yes, though ages can be adjusted by bringing the article of clothing to our store and asking for an age change, though most bodies have a set minimum," Sam also explained, "but pre-owned clothing cannot be altered in any way."

John's female head tilted. "Pre-owned clothing?"

"Clothing that originated outside of our store that was made magical by being worn before a transformation and has the body set to the original wearer," Sam explained. "Everyone who's bought from us has them."

"Can clothes be un-enchanted?" John asked.

"Yes, though only if at least one other enchanted pre-owned article exists somewhere else to change the owner back, or if the owner no longer owns any store-made clothing," Sam explained.

"And how do you know about all this?" John asked.

"Through a magical database connected to our intranet keeping track of who owns what," Sam explained. "While many believe magic and technology are mutually exclusive, they actually compliment each other quite nicely, mainly allowing us to bypass the need for receipts."

"What about when I get older and my clothes get too small?" John asked.

"For store clothing, they will adapt to the body’s aging and growth. Pre-owned clothing will not do this, so it's advised to get newer clothes enchanted when needed," Sam explained.

"What happens if someone doesn't have enchanted clothes and transforms naked?" John asked.

"As a failsafe, clothes do not transform in the circumstance the initiator is not wearing anything and does not have their own enchanted clothes to transform back," Sam answered.

"What if clothes go missing?" John asked.

"You can have both store-originated and pre-owned enchanted clothing teleported to you by calling this number," Sam answered.

"Another thing I've noticed is how... well, there's a bit of a size difference between me and the body of this swimsuit, so my clothes broke when I first transformed but changing back into my regular body, they didn't?" John asked.

"Clothing with our magic on them is enchanted to be stretchier to the point of indestructibility for safety and security," Sam explained.

"Also, I was transformed accidentally earlier and passed out so they put me in a hotel room, there's a lot of women's clothes in the closet here and some sandals... where did they come from, and can I keep them?" John asked.

"Yes, it seems like hotel staff provided a number of non-magical outfits that suited your current form," Sam explained. "You can take them home if you want to, but don't have to." That was good - he definitely wanted to keep this dress.

"Is the hotel magic too?" John asked.

"No, they just co-operate with us. They have helped a lot with magic incidents like yours, though the hotel itself is not magic," Sam answered. "Do you have any more questions?"

"Just one," John said, "Why do you guys work with a hotel instead of a hospital or something?"

"It's a lot easier for a multitude of reasons," Sam explained. "Main reason though, hotels tend to be better at keeping secrets about magic."

"Okay then," John said, "I think that's all the questions I can think of."

"Okay, then. Remember we are available 24/7 for anything from random questions to transformation-related emergencies," Sam said. "Also, Would you like a catalog?"

"How will you send one over?" John asked.

Sam chuckled. "Like this." Suddenly, a catalog popped into existence next to John on the bed!

"Woah, how'd you do that?" John asked.

"Magic," Sam answered. "I did mention teleportation."

"Yeah, I should've guessed," John said. "Bye for now!"

"Bye!" With Sam's response, John hung up the phone and looked at the catalog, and decided to...

Knock, knock.

John reached over to his left and started feeling around for his alarm clock. Wow, his arm felt longer than usual. And his chest felt... bigger somehow. And his alarm clock was gone. And he forgot that alarm clocks don’t knock somehow. He slowly opened his eyes to a light brown ceiling in a room slightly illuminated by light coming in through some curtains. He sat up, the blanket falling off of him, and looked down to see long hair fall down from his head and two large, naked breasts dangling from his chest. It took him a few seconds to piece it all together. 'Oh yeah, I turned into a lady,' he eventually remembered.

Knock, knock, knock, knock.

“John, are you ready?” the familiar voice of the store clerk said behind the hotel room door.

“No, I just woke up,” John said in his female voice.

“Well, you have to go home soon, so get ready!”

“Okay,” John replied. 'What was I dreaming about last night?' He got up, and groggily walked into the hotel bathroom, feeling lanky from his adult body. 'Something about being in front of a crowd of people or something...' He splashed some water on his face to wake himself up a bit more and looked in the mirror. 'Oh, yeah, I was in a fashion show, I think...' After starting to remember his dream, he saw that Joanne’s hair was a mess. He didn’t know why, but something about seeing his swimsuit body's hair in a state like this didn't sit right with John, even if he was going to change back right after this. Fortunately, the hotel had it's own hair brushes for some reason, and trying to remember how his mom and sister did it, he started to brush his new hair. It took him a little bit, but eventually it was presentable. 'That was easy,' he thought. He got back out of the bathroom and changed out of the bottoms, then put them in the bag where he started feeling around for his boy clothes while sitting on the bed, then eventually they started crawling out and onto him. The transformation back into John begun again, but he didn’t pay much attention to the sensations until they stopped. After he was transformed, he picked up the bag full of the stuff he’d acquired over the past day in one hand... quickly picked up the bra that slipped off and put it back in, and grabbed both the sandals by the straps with the other hand’s pinky finger, and opened the door.

“I’m ready!” John said, looking at the clerk in the doorway.

"Where are the keys?" the clerk asked.

"Keys?" John asked, before noticing the door did have a key on the inside, then he pulled it out and gave it to the clerk. "Here they are!" John then realized he was probably supposed to lock and unlock the door... oops!

“Great, let’s go,” she said, as they walked to the elevator, the clerk pressing the “Ground Floor” button when they got there.

“So, I was just going to pretend you were asleep until now since we weren’t expecting you to wake up that soon,” the clerk explained, “but going off of that big bag of stuff you’ve gotten I think you’ll have to explain a few things to your family.” John gulped. For some reason, he wasn’t too sure about that.

“I could probably just say it’s a secret!” John replied, a little nervous now. What would Mom think?

“Yeah, that could probably work, too,” the clerk responded. The rest of the elevator ride went by quietly. When they arrived at ground floor, the clerk dropped the keys off at reception and out they went to the clerk's car.

"If you want to pay me back for the swimsuit sometime then feel free," she said, a hint of playful sarcasm as they got in.

"I'll try," John said as he got in the back and put the bag next to him and the sandals on the floor. John didn't know where he would get the money, though. 'Maybe modeling as Joanne?' he thought, but he wasn't sure how to be a model. Maybe he'd ask Mildred for some pointers later. Something about modeling just felt interesting to him now. Maybe he could ask his parents or his sister or something? This car ride wasn't too eventful either, but John was thankful he was going to see his family again. As free as he felt as an adult, he was starting to miss them. Eventually, though, the clerk pulled up outside John’s house, as the two got out of the car. John picked up the sandals and the bag and excitedly ran over to the door and pressed the doorbell, as the clerk followed him. After a few moments of waiting, his mother, Ellen, opened the door and looked down at him with a huge smile.

“John!” she said, ecstatic to see her son again, immediately embracing him in a hug.

“Hi, mom!” John said, equally happy to see his mother again, and hugged her back. The clerk smiled at the scene unfolding.

“I missed you so much! I was so worried! Were you okay?” Ellen said, holding the hug.

“Yeah, I was fine,” John reassured her.

“Good,” Ellen said. After a few moments, she walked back inside, followed by John and the clerk. “Thank you so much for bringing him back, I was scared I might not see him again!” Ellen said to the clerk, putting a hand on John’s shoulder.

“You’re welcome,” the clerk said before she pulled a card out of her pocket and handed it to Ellen, who accepted it. “Well, I think my job is done here,” the clerk said with a subtle wink to John. “Feel free to come to the store again, but just be more careful next time.” John giggled a little at what the clerk said.

“Okay,” John and Ellen said in unison, as the clerk left the house and closed the door, and Ellen locked it behind her.

“So what’s in the bag?” Ellen asked, walking to sit down on the sofa. Oh, boy, here was the decision...

They even had a small jewelry counter by the cashier and a giant novelty hat rack, if you're into those things, that is. However, before he was about to scuttle ALL hope of finding swag he liked, he noticed they did have a costume section, and Halloween was just a month away.

Darting about the aisles, he saw all kinds of costumes, but nothing that "spoke to him." However, he had to stop and take pause at a particular headband sporting finely crafted curved demon horns. Rubbing along the material had an almost electric vibe; John swore he was touching real bone. "Only $3.50 too. A little high for just a headband, but MAN this looks cool!!" He pops them on and turns to a mirror nearby, where he practices scare poses. "Get the right face paint and some red tights and I got a perfect devil costume for this Halloween!! I can't wait!!"

He heads up to the counter and pays for the costume piece, meeting a rather morose and monotone older teen/young adult girl with bobbed hair, which was an odd muted purple color, almost like stone, wearing a Korn cap, plum colored lipstick, and wearing a large duster over her body. She chimes out in a dull fashion, "That'll be $3.78. Tell me, why is a kid like you in here?"

"Well, this place is new, and I was really curious about..."

"I see." She says as she's handing back the change, her pale teal eyes still showing her malaise. "Well... Well, you enjoy those horns there."

"Oh, I will!!" John exclaims on his way out returning to his regularly scheduled plans.

Little did he know, but that "electric vibe" was more than he had suspected.

"I should have kept working at Hot Topic..." the cashier groaned, removing her hat for a moment to reveal two grey horse-like ears sticking out of her hair and scratching the left one.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------

Back home, John was all giddy about showing off his new purchase to his mom.

"That's nice, dear, but aren't you jumping the gun?" his mom asked.

John laughed and said, "You can never be too prepared for Halloween, mom!!"

"Well, alright. Go get ready for supper then!!"

John washed up rather quickly, but stopped when he noticed he could finally see at eye level with the bathroom mirror. Normally, he had needed a stool to see clearly, as it was perched rather high, being it was also a medicine cabinet and, you know, childproofing, and he still really needed the stool to see his face in it's entirety, but it seemed clear John had grown recently.

"Hey, guess what!! I was able to finally see in the mirror without that crummy footstool!!"

"That's excellent. I'll tell dad when he gets in."

"Another late night?"

"Yep..." she sighs.

"Alright, off to bed with you, mister!! I don't want to here your TV or Playstation on either!! It's a school night, ya know." John's dad utters.

John wanders upstairs towards his room, parked in between that of his younger sister Charlotte, 6, and his older brother Axton, 14. His brother was still up, watching TV. "Lucky... Getting to stay up because he's older..." John mutters as he closes his door. He quietly turns in and goes to sleep.

Standing in the stalls, John stared at the frilly maid outfit he had in his hands. Classic black and white, with some wavy trimmings. But holding it by a hanger, he could tell that it looked like it was made for someone a few years younger- not to mention, a woman!

"Is this really what I'm supposed to wear?" But then the face of the store clerk flashed in his head. I don't want to make Miss Yumi mad at me again... John put aside the oddity of knowing the clerk's name and rushed to put on the uniform. As he figured, he struggled just to get his head through the hole, and while the outfit ended up being a little stretchier than he expected, he felt like it would be almost impossible to take a deep breath while wearing it.

After a few seconds however, John felt tingles all over his body. Suddenly, the dress felt much more comfortable. Looking in the mirror, it almost seemed like he had gotten a little shorter-

"Are you done in there yet?" Yumi called from outside, disrupting John's thoughts.

"A-almost!" he replied. As he took a chance to smooth out some wrinkles, his eyes went down to his dainty, hairless legs. Wait, something's wrong...I almost forgot the stockings! He found the black nylon accessories resting on the nearby bench, quickly pulling them up each of his legs to reach mid-thigh. He looked back in the mirror, happy with the fit as he noticed the slightest bit of exposed skin between his stockings and the hem of his dress. The top dipped down to show a little bit of his chest, but nothing he'd consider inappropriate for the job. Very cute!

“Let’s go back to my place first, then we’ll head over.” He smiled. “You need me to carry you?” A shiver went down your spine. “N-No thanks, I’m… good.” Mack didn’t live too far from here, you were sure you could make it. “Well, if you start getting tired, let me know, okay? I don’t want you nodding off before our food even gets to the table.” He chuckles and ruffles your hair. Is this what the cashier talked about when he mentioned how ‘reality would change’ or whatever? You laugh awkwardly before following him. Your thicker diaper means you have some trouble keeping up, but you manage to stay behind him.

Although you get a little winded, you make it to Mack’s house with no difficulties. “Good job keeping up, little dude!” He laughs before opening his front door and letting you in. “I just gotta grab my keys, the place is a bit of a ways away.” You nodded. “What kind of place is it?” You ask, stepping inside and looking around. “It’s a cool little bar the guys found. Trust me, I KNOW you’ll love it.” He picks up his keys from the side table and walks out to the car. You go to join him. As you leave, you can’t help but notice that there were baby toys lying on the floor of his living room. You’ve known Mack for years, and know he doesn’t have any younger siblings, nor does he babysit. You’re a bit weirded out, but try and pretend you didn’t see anything.

Making your way to the car, you see Mack holding the backseat door open. He bows and says, “Your chariot awaits, m’lord”, in a stuffy faux-British accent with a stupid grin on his face. “Shut up, you dork.” You roll your eyes. Normally you sit up front, but for some reason you don’t mind sitting in the back. “Seriously, what kept ya? I was waiting for, like, a BAJILLION years.” He laughs. “I wasn’t gone for that long!” He just continues laughing like an idiot.

You sigh and head over, only to see that there’s a booster seat in the back. “Uh, dude…?” You look up at him and he just smiles. “What are you waiting for? Let’s get going already!” He sounds excited, and apparently oblivious to it. “Bu-But…” You motion towards the booster seat and he chuckles. “Don’t worry, I’ll make sure to buckle you in, I know you have trouble with it sometimes.” You gaze at him in astonishment, before sighing and resigning yourself to the booster seat. You really wish you just headed home.

This was abnormally childish of him. “Please, can we just get going…?” You ask, having been humiliated enough. He sticks his tongue out. “You’re no fun tonight.” He teases.

After buckling you in, he gets in the driver’s seat and starts the car. “All systems are go, Preparing for takeoff, over KRZZT.” He laughs to himself as he starts the car and begins driving. This was all too weird. Your best friend just put you in a booster seat, and was now acting strangely immature himself. His shorts had regressed slightly past onto thighs now,tightening and gaining a slight sheen as well.

As he dried and wiped his hands, he couldn't help but notice he'd made a mess of crumbs as he was cleaning.
"What sort of manner-less prude does this? I cannot be this much of a slob, I must take responsibility."

The thought weirded him out, but once again arguments were pointless, so he began wiping. And wiping the spot clean. Someone walking by caused him to turn away quickly and jump behind his chair, before resuming. And wiping some more, and than some more. Before he knew it, the whole table was shining clean. As was his shiny hair, which had straightened and lightened a bit.

He looked to the table next to it, and felt an odd joy in what he had done. People sure liked to leave messes afterall, maybe he could be polite and clean that one as well? He had sat a table away from it afterall.
1123222222211212221111.title: Changes continue

11232222222112122211111.content:
"Wow, that table sure is dirty." Most people weren't exactly clean around food courts, especially children. Whoever ate there seemed to be long gone, so Dave didn't have a problem getting over there. Still, he hesitated a bit as he looked.

"It is disgusting, but why am I caring so much. I mean, I've cleaned things before, but not like this." The quotes just went on in Dave's head, as he couldn't figure out the answer to any one of them. Why was he being such a neat freak? Still, looking at the dirty crumbs on the table, a small pout formed in his cheeks.

"Oh, it's so icky. We don't want anyone getting sick."

With that, Dave walked right over, washing and wiping down said table. To his slight surprise, nobody really seemed to care too much about a random person just wiping down tables, especially one who didn't look like an employee. Still, one person did look at Dave briefly, causing him to blush and look away. The person didn't seem to mind too much.

"Ugh, it's so embarrassing when they stare." Dave quietly mumbled before shaking his head again. "Sheesh, why am I acting like such a wimp?"

Still, Dave kept sprinkling some water and wiping down the table. As he did, he even began humming a soft tune to himself, which almost seemed to give him some peace of mind. Still, as this was going on, the laces of his shoes vanished completely, as the sides of his shoes crawled down a ways. As they became more like leather, they formed into pair of soft, black ballet flats.

However, the oddest thing was that, as Dave seemed to finish, a tiny light came out of his fingertips, coating the table as it looked even shinier. This brought a smile to his face.

"Perfect." While part of him felt happy, most of him still felt odd about acting like this. And where did that light come from? It was almost like magic.
11232222222112122211111.title: Cleaning some more

choices: He came in looking for a new job
112322222221121222111111.content:
Dave was so happy to have cleaned those tables. They were filthy afterall, and it wouldn't be proper hygiene to leave the place unsanitary.

"A clean and proper area makes for a refreshed and proper soul." He quipped happily, before becoming confused where that thought even came from.

Sighing, he sat back down on his seat, wondering what he should do next. He tugged at the rubber black gloves slightly, but less aggressively than before. Already he'd gotten use to them enough that it took more effort to get frustrated at them. As he tugged, he whistled and played around with his paper towel.

His whistling turned into a slight hymn, and he felt strangely relaxed. He knew he should be finding a solution for this weird glove, but it hardly mattered to him. Nor did the knots tied at the back of his expanding hair, taking on a graceful crystalline shine, or his ballet flats combing up his legs and forming silken stockings up to his knees. His upper shirt and shorts finally became as one, and he was so caught up singing gently a tune he hardly knew his recollection of levitating the towel were not present.

"That's a pretty neat trick." A voice said nearby. Almost like a fearful mouse, he jumped up and scurried away fearfully from the sound alone.

"Oops, sorry I didn't mean to disturb you. My name's Michelle, I'm the one that barged in line earlier? Remember?"

"R.right."

When Dave finally had the courage to look up at her face, he didn't see it was the same person, an older 20 some brunette with decent features and a womanly body. The kind of girl he'd normally be going for, but now he just felt timid and embarrassed to be caught singing like that. Atleast, that's what he assumed she meant by 'neat trick.'

Dave, with great reluctance moved forward and greeted her, but just barely able to meet her at eye level.

"I see you were cleaning earlier too. I always get upset at messes and dirty tables, so thank goodness someone was doing something about it." She told him trying to be polite.

"Y..yeah, I don't..don't like messes." He looked down at her chest for a moment, before turning away suddenly even more ashamed.

Michelle merely rubbed her head chuckling. "Me neither. So what brings you here?" She asked.

Dave squeaked up and rubbed his hands behind his back, kicking the ground with his ballet flats. He was so terrified of saying the wrong thing, he didn't feel his gloves lengthening up his arms,

When he finally spoke, he told her,

"Um....well.. I came in looking for a new job." Dave squeaked out.

"Really? That's really neat. You're obviously good at your job." Michelle smiled at Dave. "For all I know, you might already have the job, given how fast you work."

"Really?....Thanks." Dave blushed and smiled, even bowing a little bit in thanks. Immediately though, he stood straight up, wondering where he came from. Why was he acting so prim and proper? Still, his mind didn't go near the strange shop, as if he had resolved to never think of it again. As you shrugged that off, Michelle had something to say.

"Looking at how you work, it's almost like you're a modern Cinderella."

"Oh no...I couldn't..."

"That's a good thing. You just seem very nice. I hear tonight's karaoke night for many of the employees. If you have the job, perhaps you'll be on it." For some reason, Dave instantly started waving his hands in embarrassment.

"M-Me sing?! I couldn't possibly...." Dave trailed off again, almost slipping on the ground, but caught himself with the table. As he gathered himself, he noticed that his fused shirt and shorts seemed to be getting tighter on his body. And, was it him, or was he thinner? He was sure that he was eating right.

"Well, I think I need to go for now. I'll be here tonight. Feel free to talk to me if I see you." Michelle said as she waved good bye, to which Dave slowly waved back, paper towel and water levitating back to her.

"Odd clothes? Levitating? Am I hallucinating or something?" Dave asked himself.
1123222222211212221111112.title: He came in looking for a new job

11232222222112122211111121.content:
Dave got up and walked his way out of the cafeteria, making his way through the hallways. He saw shops litter each side, and felt strangely attracted to some and afraid of others. As he crept closer to one, he looked into a show window and saw his reflection staring back. He had a near-blouse like outfit with heels, a skirt, and longer hair. But for some reason this all escape his grasp, he was more afraid of this reflection for the image staring back itself.

"Ah, whose there!" But it was only him. He looked around him to see if anyone heard him, less he cry out of sheer embarrassment. But nobody payed attention so he sighed and slowly stared back at the feminine vision meeting him.

What he saw slightly startled him, but he also felt strangely drawn to it. The person in the reflection was pretty. Rather pretty, if he had to say so, but a sense of modesty welled up and he didn't want to get in over his head praising it. But there was still something to be desired in it, an image of prettyness that lacked finesse, grace and charms almost.

He turned around slightly, bending left and right as he kept his eyes on the image. Tucking the sleeves on his blouse, straightening out the skirt, trying for a more elegant pose were all things he tried to straighten the image he saw out. Still, something didn't quite sit right, but he felt that might fix it self over time.

He licked his hand, only to find that raw and unladylike. So he only tapped his finger to the tip of his tongue, and began wetting his hair and shaping it, bit by bit.

This shouldn't have done much, but with a sparkle and perhaps a bit of magic, his hair began to grow more, upwards this time as it became more shapely with each gentle stroke or poke. It began levying up, combing itself vertically like a that of something magical. When it was finished, it was slightly shorter at the bottom, save for two playful bangs swishing at his side, but the rest of his hair was combed up and in a style that would be more fit for royalty or perhaps a magical creature, with braids and nearly welted stands as demure and pretty as a cornucopia at a fall's lovely thanksgiving dinner. She swirled it around, hoping it wouldn't hit anybody but it stood completely in place.

The new look put a gentle smile on her face. She walked out with her skirt swishing about, eager to go home but still keeping today and tonight's events in mind.

Dave seemed to feel a bit better as she walked along the mall, though still a bit nervous when others would look at her. Her legs, all smoother than they used to be, looked nice the skirt she wore, and the heels clacked along the ground. The large amounts of hair on her head made her look quite elegant, yet also unique at the same time.

"Oh, I should get home before tonight. I need to get some things done." Dave remembered the comments about tonight, still feeling quite embarrassed about possibly singing. There was quite a bit of time beforehand, so perhaps going home would ease her mind of it. With that in mind, she kept on walking, going past the store from earlier. The lady inside got a quick look at Dave and smiled.

"I'd say there will be a new maid around for a long time." she said to herself.

Dave didn't hear that obviously, but still felt a bit tense as she passed the store. Something ticked her mind about that place, but perhaps it wasn't a good thing to think about. After all, who knew when your mother would be home after her errands. To Dave's surprise though, she felt something in one of her blouse pockets, which turned out to be a pair of car keys. While Dave's mind briefly wondered what they were doing there, she immediately thought that they were for her own car in the parking lot. That was how she got here in the first place.

"Wait, I thought Mom got me here."

This conflicting thought process stayed with Dave even after she exited the mall and found her own car, and a nice one at that. Taking off her heels to drive, she began driving like an expert, while some towels and other materials were flying around and cleaning up the car.

"We can't have this place looking dirty. Come on, keep going." She smiled as if dancing to music. The ride home was rather pleasant, as Dave parked it in the driveway and called the materials to her hands. Putting her heels on, she nearly skipped towards the house, feeling pretty happy. As she did though, she briefly brought a hand to her chest, feeling something itching there.

"I hope it's nothing too bad." She blushed a bit.

Well, the elegant maid was about to get some curves to go with it.

"All right." said Dave.

Dave thought this was all weird for a bit, but her mind quickly shoved it aside. Part of her knew that all of this just came after that weird store, but now it was time to be a real maid!

Diane snapped her fingers, and a sudden gust of air blasted through the room while a sand-filled timekeeper had appeared next to her, large enough for her to sit on but already flipped and counting down.

In that instant, a gust of air had breezed about and wrecked everything in the house. Like a hurricane hitting an orderly, proper and well decorated home, everything was now in tatters. Bookshelves were foiled over, couches and sofas were tossed, picture frames and knickknacks no longer in place. The whole hose was totaled, even some of the paint seemed chipped. Cracks had appeared in floorboard and on the stairs, and this was only in the very first room! Dave dreaded to see what the upstairs or the kitchen looked like, but with the sound of broken glass shatter nearby he wasn't in any rush to worry and check, he had to get cleaning.

He hurried and quickly put books back on their shelves and with what little strength he had, moved the furniture back with difficulty. He'd tried hard to look for the nails and picture frames that had belonged on each wall and put them back up. Some of them were cracked, but with a poke to the tongue and than to the frame, a little magic fixed that. He took a sweeper and cleaned whatever was unfixable, mounding up dirt and debris, taking the time to lick her pointer fingers and wave them just gracefully enough that the magic worked when she repaired cracks in the floor and wall. She took a hammer and nail, and with a little concentration was able to levitate them and quickly put the picture frames, hung object, damaged stairs and all of it back in no time at all thanks to the power of a little maiden magic.

Finally the room was looking spotless.

"Done! How'd I do?" Dave said enthusiastically, rather excitable and proud for once he'd done such a good job.

Diane looked below her for a moment, and with a shrug smiled Dave's way.
"Not bad kid, but this is only the living room. There are 7 other rooms in this house, and the clock's ticking." She gave the top of the timekeeper a knock, causing minutes of sand to shake and fall towards the bottom glass chasm.
She tapped the Tiara on her forehead and another gust of wind blasted through the rest of the house once more, making things even further difficult. The Living Room was surprisingly unaffected though, clean as Dave had left it.

Dave panicked and got back to work.

The gust of wind this time had went towards the kitchen, so that was Dave's next destination. Entering that, she had to cover her ears as the loud sound of pots and pans everywhere hit the ground. She was surprised that the whole neighborhood didn't hear that. The water from the sink began flowing endlessly, flooding the ground as cabinets were beginning to fall apart. You'd think the ceiling would come down too, but only a few cracks. With all of this, there was no time to waste. She stacked up pots and pans in their correct orders, while she enchanted a mop to at least start on the water on the floor. Once they were in their cabinets and she was able to hammer down the loose ones, she turned her attention quickly to the sink, looking underneath and fixing the somewhat broken plumbing. She even surprised herself with how fast she was doing things she didn't know before. Thankfully, food from the fridge was still in tact, though a bit disorderly. She quickly took care of that.

"Nice job. 6 more to go!"

Dave heard Diane's voice in her head, feeling the next gust down the hall, towards the laundry room. Right when she entered that, a sweater immediately hit her in the face, causing her to untangle it. As you'd expect, clothes were everywhere, on the floor and on the ironing board. The washing machine seemed to be on the verge of overflowing too. Focusing on that, she got the wet clothes out, putting them in to the dryer quickly as a little magic took care of the washing machine. Getting the ironer going, she got out which clothes needed ironing and began smoothing them out, putting them onto their correct hangers and hanging them up. Truth be told, this was a bit tiring, even as she began to sort the laundry.

"Keep going. Still got many rooms after this."

"This is crazy." Dave said to herself as she hung up the last of the clothes. Socks and underwear went into a laundry basket, ready to be sorted another time. The whole place was spotless now. Dave gently wiped her brow.

"Okay, all good."

He had to admit the shirt itself was rather... girly to give it a term, but the colors were actually quite pleasing and the shirt itself was made out of a soft material. Jason considered trying it on... just for kicks, but at the same time the largest size the store carried was just too small for him and he did not need yet another T-shirt crowding up his closet.

Jason was about to set the T-shirt back on the rack when suddenly he felt a tap on his shoulder. Turning around Jason discovered one of the store's clerks behind him. She was very cute. Sixteen in age, probably; dirty blonde, shoulder-length hair with just curl to notice, slim face, pretty white smile, small in height (Jason stood near 6 feet and judging from her height she was probably barely reaching 5'3"). She wore a long-sleeved shirt with a pink core and stripped pink and white sleeves, capri length skinny jeans which revealed just enough for what Jason guessed was a pair of white and pink stripped socks, and red converse sneakers.

"You know," began the clerk, "That shirt looks just right for you."

Understanding what the clerk was going to try to do, Jason decided to hear her out at least. "Really, you think so?"

"Oh yes," continued the clerk as she took the shirt from him and placed it over his chest. Was it just him or was the shirt slightly bigger now? "I'm guessing at school you're probably one of the cooler guys right?"

"Yeah a little, definitely not uncool," said Jason as he took the shirt from the clerk and held it up for inspection.

"Well, this shirt matches you blue eyes rather nicely, plus the colorful bolt gives any outfit a real pop of power."

But you're jeans are near navy, plus the number of scraps, tears, and dirt stains give it just enough color difference to really work. This combination could be so cool."

"Really you think so."

"Of course. This outfit and that shirt could easily make you... at least 20% cooler."

Cool, cool, that was a powerful word. Jason had never considered it before, but he did like being cool and each time the clerk said, heck every time he though about it, Jason felt a mild tingle in the back of his head. Yes he liked being cool. He had to try on this shirt.

"Yes, I've been waiting for spring. It'll be nice to see the beach without... what's this?" asked Stephanie as she held up the bag.

"Oh those... Well, I felt bad for using so much of our time so I bought you something." Opening the bag Stephanie squealed in glee as she discovered the rainbow toe socks. "Oh my gawh, Jackson these are so cute. Thank you." Jackson then received a kiss as his reward. This kiss was quickly followed by the sound of Stephanie's leather flats hitting the floor, the yanks and throwing of Stephanie's socks, and the tugging on of the socks. Looking to his right, Jackson saw a cute girl with long brown hair in green eyes, green shirt with brown light coat, and jeans, all very common things. Then suddenly color as she set her rainbow feet and toes on the dash.

"They look great on you," said Jackson as he returned his attention to the road.

"Thanks. They're so comfortable. I can't wait to show them off!"

John was the type of guy to like going to Hot Topic. Not for the emo fashion the store chain somehow got associated with, but for the plethora of geeky memorabilia such as merchandising and clothes from his favorite shows and movies. So, when the 15-year old heard of a new store in his mall that was rather similar, he immediately assumed it was going to be right up his alley.

While the rest of his family shopped at other stores, he went to Styles That Change You. He rummaged through the various racks, and finally found a shirt that he would be happy spending his money on.

However, the feminine robe he moved out of the way leapt onto him like a giant Facehugger.

"AAH! What the hell is happening?"

John's vision was temporarily blocked by the fabric until he found himself wearing the robe. Somehow, it didn't rip and was oriented perfectly on his body. The Space symbol from Homestuck was on the front. Yes, he loved Homestuck and Jade, but he couldn't pull off wearing her God-Tier outfit! Was this a joke?

And then, his ears grew fur and changed into dog ears. After some involuntary swivels of his new ears and the symbol, John knew exactly what was going to happen to him.

"Jade? Why J-Jade?" the nervous boy stammered, blushing as he did so.

1123222222222222222222211111.content:
Note: This is an edited and enhanced version of last chapter, since the author of this story hasn't responded to my requests to edit the chapter.

John was the type of guy to like going to Hot Topic. Not for the emo fashion the store chain somehow got associated with, but for the plethora of geeky memorabilia such as merchandising and clothes from his favorite shows and movies. So, when the 15-year old heard of a new store in his mall that was rather similar, he immediately assumed it was going to be right up his alley.

While the rest of his family shopped at other stores, he went to Styles That Change You. He rummaged through the various racks, and finally found a shirt that he would be happy spending his money on.

However, the feminine robe he moved out of the way leapt onto him like a giant Facehugger.

"AAH! What the hell is happening?"

Somehow, it didn't rip and oriented itself perfectly on his body. The Space symbol from Homestuck was on the front. Yes, he loved Homestuck and Jade, but he couldn't pull off wearing her God-Tier outfit! Was this a joke?

His hearing began to dim as his brain began to disassociate itself with his ears.

"Something's not right here."

And then two fleshy protrusions grew out of his head, and his old ears were rendered deaf. They resembled hairless dog ears at first, but that quickly changed as white fur cascaded out of them (Pun intended).

John tried screaming, but he couldn’t hear it or anything else around him.

John knew. He absolutely, unequivocally knew exactly what was going to happen to him as soon as the robe leapt onto him. It only took the arrival of new anatomical features to confirm his suspicions.

“No!”

The loudness of John’s frenzied shouts was amplified by his newfound deafness.

“Fuck, no!”

His old ears rang as they retracted into his head. New nerves sprouted within his head that connected his new ears to his brain and altered his nose, allowing John to hear again. The change also boosted John's hearing and smell by a factor of thousands as well as allowing him to swivel his ears.

John’s jaws realigned with an unpleasant CRACK, giving him buckteeth.

The new smells and sounds caused him to collapse, as he was unable to process the new sensations.

Under the robe, all of John's shirt under his upper chest vanished. What remained changed into a bra, which felt awkward on a chest without breasts.

Also, why the fuck did guys named John always get shafted anyway? First, it was Egbert and now him.

Meanwhile, a crowd had begun to form around the entrance to the store and the lone clerk working stood agape. The flashes of the spectators’ phone cameras only served to disorientate the boy even more.

(I love it, though) So in the bargain bin he was searching through, he was revolted when he saw a cosplay suit depicting an anthro Tsunami (he had forgotten her name long ago after he returned The Dragonet Prophecy to the library because he didn't like it). It didn't come with a head, though.

"Eh, the clothes that stores have." John said with a voice positively dripping with disgust whIle shaking his head and shoving the suit aside.

Imagine his surprise when the suit unzipped itself, flew out of the bin, and forced itself onto him! John screamed and desperately tried to rip the suit off.

"Anyone! Help me!" But he remembered that there were no other customers in the store and earlier today, he tried to find the employees, but there were none in the store.

"Looks like whatever practical joke this is was probably set up by the employees!" John sighed.

He reached for the back of the suit and tried to find the zipper. But he couldn't feel anything other than the spikes on the back.

What changes will John go through first?
112322222222222222222222221222222121.title: This is what you get for hating Wings of Fire

1123222222222222222222222212222221211.content:
A strange sensation came over John's neck at that moment almost as if something were sprouting out of it.

He rushed to a nearby full-body mirror and to his horror, blue scales had begun growing on his neck.

John slumped on his knees.

"Please, no! I don't want to be a dragon!"

Then, he slammed his hands on his mouth. His voice now sounded androgynous. He could easily voice a male or female character in a cartoon.

As the scales rose up his neck, three slits on each side of his neck gashed open. John would learn later that these were gills.

He tried to scream, but only a wheeze came out. His vocal chords were changing to that of a female dragonet's.

When the scales finished their march up John's neck, his mouth and nose bulged out and merged together to make a snout.

John's eyes widened at the sight of the hideous, still scaleless, bulge on his face.

The scales on his neck made a double time and rushed up his face.

The tip of his ears pointed to resemble an elf's just before the scales covered his ears and the snout.

His eyelashes fell off as his formerly brown eyes became green.

John noticed that his eyes looked more feminine and soft.

Great! I'm not just going to become a dragon, I'm gonna turn female!

His hair then fell off, replaced by horns.

What should transform now?
1123222222222222222222222212222221211.title: Head and voice

112322222222222222222222221222222122.content: How about you touch a black and blue 32B t-shirt bra and thong set when you picked them up off the floor and you start to change when your riding your bike on the way home.....

1123222222222222222222222212222222.content:
Your continue to browse through the, ridiculously extensive selection of bizarre clothing. You shift the rack to see a rather colourful shirt, not noticing when a black sleeve slowly reached out from between the racks and brushes against you.

The change is instant. The fibers of the black sleeve come undone and pierce through your shirt before reworking themselves into the stitching. Silently the top pulled itself across your shoulders, weaving into your top and infecting the home fabric with it's more sturdy materials. You trailed bits of threads in your wake as what you were wearing was shredded and the ninja top pulled itself over your body. Taking over the space the top had been before sewing itself back together over you.

You didn't show any outward signs of noticing the change. Except for maybe tugging at the collar and wondering why it got so hot all of a sudden.

The same thing happened for your pants. With expert stealth skill the ties of the ninja pants unbuckled your belt and with one deft motion whipped it around it's leg. A small patch of the leather bubbled up and squared off until it had grown a small knife pouch. The black pants invaded your jeans and assasinated them with expert skill. The blue was swiftly swallowed up by the black. Reaching downwards towards your socks the tiniest of threads from the pants invaded the thin white pair. However instead of replacing them the black from the threads expelled outwards like a quid expelling ink, dyeing them dark.

The soles of your shoes tore away bit by bit with every step. Not in bits though. Each step left a slice on the floor as though your soles were neatly shaven. The threads holding the fabric together unwinding causing your shoe to fall apart save for a small sandal strap. The rubber wole of your sandal broke apart. Chaning from a solid mass into countless pieces of flat straw which retied itself into a firm yet silent show.

Aside from the mask parachuting in from above, you were now dressed like a ninja. All without realising it.
1123222222222222222222222212222222.title: Ninja Outfit

Your jeans soon become skinny jeans
