As you're walking through the store, your shoes begin to feel awkward, almost harder. That's because the sneaker's material is starting to become harder, soon shifting into a leather material. Next, the boot's heel begins to rise and very soon, it becomes a high heeled cowgirl boot.

What happens next?
1123222222222222222222222221.title: Your Shoes Change

1123222222222222222222222222.content:
Your hair starts to grow into an odango style and your shirt starts to turn red. It morphs into a dress merging with your pants. Your neckline raises as it reaches just under your chin. Next your socks turn into stockings while your shoes become flats. Finallymakeup is applied to your face.

Do you remember your old life or are you a new person?
1123222222222222222222222222.title: Your Hair Changes

11233.content:
You screamed again as he saw the world around him quickly shrinking as the impossibly small dress was slowly working its way up your legs, passed your thighs. You winced, feeling your insides moving but you could not tell what was truly happening under the advancing pink dress. You screamed again as you felt his hair kiss your shoulders as the dress was now advancing up your torso, despite your efforts to rip it off yourself.

"Help!" you yelled, hoping someone would hear. "Someone help me!"

Only no one came and you screamed again, noticing your voice rising in octaves as the dress finally forced itself onto you completely and you felt your arms push through the short sleeves. As you both heard and felt the zipper in the back close on its own, you realized that you were no longer wearing your sneakers but a pair of black mary janes!

"This isn't happening!" you whispered, too frightened to scream. "How can I be a little boy in a dress!?" you quickly pulled the dress up and gulped as you saw a pair of pink butterfly panties. "I'm a..."

Then a voice reached you, causing you to drop the front of your dress. It was the shop owner, a tall and well dressed woman with long brown hair and bright hazel eyes. "Ah, I see you decided to be a little girl for a while, young man." she said smiling. "Interesting choice."

"I-I didn't choose this!" screamed John, frantic. "I was just moving it aside to get to another shirt and it forced itself onto me, changing me into a little girl!"

The shop owner sighed. "That happens sometimes, with so much magical clothing in one place..." she said, a smile forming. "You do look cute though." then she turned serious. "I am required to warn you that, after one month, the change becomes permanent."

"Well... can't I pick another outfit?" asked John, nervous.

The shop owner shook her head. "I'm sorry but, once you choose an article of clothing or it chooses you, the new reality that comes with it must run its course for at least one week."

"What... What new reality?" asked John, now terrified.

"There you are, Jane." said a voice.

It was...
11233.title: A little girls' dress.

112331.content:
Who is your "mother?"

Is it your old mom or someone else that is either transformed or about to be transformed?
112331.title: Your mom.

112332.content:
"There you are, Jessica." said a tall teenage girl with long blond hair and green eyes

You recognized her as Sarah Wild, your girlfriend and gulped before turning to the shop owner who knelled down and whispered in your ear. "This is interesting." she said. "Reality seems to have changed with the dress." she smiled then added, "I wish you luck in getting back here before the end of the month."

With that said, Sarah took your wrist and dragged you from the store. "I want you to avoid that place, Jess." she said, sternly. "That woman is no good, she likes to toy with unsuspecting boys and little girls."

You gasped, hearing that then turned to find the woman smiling madly as she waved goodbye to you.
112332.title: Your older sister.

1123321.content:
Not good. This is not happening! your mind screamed, as Sarah walked home with you. She refused to answer your questions about what she knew about that store, and what she meant about 'that woman toying with boys and girls'. Instead she told you that you shouldn't go there and not to worry about it. You protested, but she gave you a stare telling you that you'd better back down. sighing, you remained quiet. Finally you're arrived at her house, which of course means your new house. Least it was still the same, since you know you way arround it. She half dragged you inside, saying something about not telling mommy if you promise not to go there. Again, you sigh and nod. Its not like there is anything else you can do, she clearly thinks you're her little sister instead of her boyfriend.

You need time to think, especially since the woman said you're unable to change back for at least a week. May as well get to know this 'Jane' life you're found yourself in. You walk upstairs, and open the first door. Its Sarah's room, and its appears from the first look the same as it was when you was here last. Since you don't know the whole Jane-Sarah relationship, you quickly close the door. You open the second door, knowing its the guest bedroom
1123321.title: Sarah takes you home

choices: Try to get used to your new body
Try to find out your relationships within the family
11233211.content:
You almost felt pain after opening the door. The walls were bright pink. There was a line of stuffed animals on your bed, which had pink sheets with yellow flowers. There were buckets full of My Little Pony, Polly Pocket, Barbie, Littlest Pet Shop, and other girl toys. Statues of unicorns lined a shelf on the wall. There was also a hot pink chest, which, from your little sister, you were certain was full of princess clothes. There was also a wardrobe, which,strangely enough, opened on it's own, revealing dresses, skirts, and leggings. Above your bed, there was a row of letters, in the shape of a rainbow. It spelled, 'Jane Wild'

You ran your hand through blonde hair. This wasn't good.

What do you do?
11233211.title: its a pink,girly girls room

choices: Try to call your old house
112332111.content:
"You OK, pigeon?" You yelp as you whirl and find Sarah standing at the top of the stairs. She has her jacket off, revealing the black-and-white striped tank top that you always liked... Only now, the brief swell in your stomach that signals arousal reminds you that you shouldn't be aroused. Sarah isn't your girlfriend anymore. She's your older sister.

Sarah smiles. "Come on. I didn't mean to scare you with that story. It's just..." She pauses. "There's a lot of bad things that have happened at that store. You know. Robberies. Kidnappings. Children have been abducted in the middle of the day I don't want that to happen to you."

She bends down in front of you and presses her knuckle against your cheek in a mock punch. Your cheeks turn red, and you find yourself grinning in spite of yourself. Then she hugs you, and suddenly, your hands are clammy, your eyes bulging, looking over her shoulder without really seeing anything. "I love you," Sarah says, and as much as you've always cherished those words, now, they sound hollow, false, the promise of a feeling that doesn't exist anymore. Not until next week, you tell yourself, although it's hard to think that far ahead.

Sarah lets go and opens the door to her room. "You really OK?" she asks again.

"Yeah," you say, suppressing a wince. You sound like a My Little Pony. "I just need to take a nap. Then I'll feel better."

This seems to satisfy Sarah's concern. She nods, and without another word, steps into her room. The door closes shut. You stand there in the darkened hallway, aware of the difficulties ahead. Such as, for example, resisting the urge to creep into Sarah's room and snuggle up beside her in bed, or peeking in while she's changing.

The best distraction you can manage is directing yourself in the direction of the bathroom. You turn on the lights and close the door carefully behind you. To the left is the mirror--your stomach just barely comes up to the sink.

"Oh wow..." You exhale. For the first time, you have a clear picture of the little girl you've become. "Shit..." It didn't occur to you how tiny Jane's face is; like a soft-edged arrowhead smothered by a perfect mop of hair. It crowns your head and fits into the grooves of your neck as if it were a wig. A modest, white-frilled collar caps off the dress, but farther down, you observe how closely the fabric hews to your figure. At age ten, eleven... however old Jane is, you can see the tall, solidly-built woman she will become... much like Sarah.

"I really am a girl," you say, as if there was any doubt. But until this moment, everything that had happened felt like a dream, or at least surreal enough that at any second you felt like you might snap out of it. Now, leaning in and staring into those crystal blue eyes - exactly like Sarah's - you have trouble believing that you were ever a boy. "What am I supposed to do?"
112332111.title: You learn a little more about yourself

1123321112.content:
You go downstairs, to the phone in the kitchen, and after a deep breath, you dial the number. You wait what seems like forever between rings.

"Thanks for calling Pirate Pizza, can you please hold."

You hang up. Their gone, you think. With that you realise, you can barely picture Dad and Mom. Just like you felt looking in the mirror.

"Jane, what are you doing," a woman, older hair blond like yours, only with a few streaks of gray. Still, her tone is concerned, friendly, rather than challenging. She puts her arms around you, and you feel warm and comfortable. "Can you tell me what's going on, dear."

You look up into her face and see nothing but loving concern. "Not yet."

"Can we do anything about it."

"Not right now."

"Then why don't you put it aside, it's family night after all."

"Okay mom." Theirs no need to worry Jane's mother.

Family night is you, Sarah, and Mom talking over Chinese take out. Dad calls. He's an international lawyer working a case in London and next week, during spring break your all going to go see him. It's followed by movies. You sit happily between your mother and your sister, watching Alicia Silverstone be Clueless and fall asleep to the ending credits of Frozen telling you to 'Let it Go'.
1123321112.title: Try to call your old house

choices: Quick, you need am excuse to stay home!
You can wait until after Spring Break. What could possibly go wrong?
11233211121.content:
Over the next week it's hard to be anything other than Jane Wild. Every time you look in a mirror, each time Sarah or Mom hugs you. Every time you get dressed, share jokes with your school friends, Mary and Alice you can't help but forgot that you ever were a boy. Boys after all are....strange.
Yet differences remind you of before. Sarah was a middling student like yourself, before. She's on the honor roll and in advanced classes. Many of her friends are the straight A students who were just faces in the hall to you both before. You suspect many of her friends from before are now just faces in the hall. She helps you with your own homework, teases you and spends a lot of time with you. Every time she talks to you, you find yourself soaking it up; and thinking of her less as you girlfriend and more like the cool older sister you want to be like when your older. By the end of the week you even forget to feel jealous of Sarah's boyfriend. Instead you get butterflies in your stomach when he smiles at you.

On some level all of this makes you want to get back to the store the first day you can. But you're all flying to London to see Dad the night before. Surely it can wait one more week.
11233211121.title: Over the next week....you.

112332111212.content:
Truth is, You, Jane, wants to see Dad loves the idea of exploring a large city while staying at a fancy hotel. What's more, your sister and Mom have promised to take you shopping, and you and sis are going up to Stratford on Avon to see the RSC perform makes you squeal with delight (Mom read Shakespeare as bedtime stories).

When you're thinking as John, you think of how this trip will translate back when the world is back to normal. You and Sarah will be sharing a room for a week at her parents expense after all. You don't know what that'll mean, but, you're close to each other. That'll be good, right?

There are details, like that Dad wasn't involved in Sarah's life, you much less both of you, you weren't flying to London, or anything else like that. Still, a trip like this seems very cool.

And it is. After the first night and a break for jetlag every day is spent exploring London, either you and Sarah, sometimes with Mom and most afternoons with Dad, whom Jane has known all her life but John has never met. The Sarah he dated only mentioned him bitterly.

Though you aren't thinking about it, each day, in your unguarded moments you are Jane. You're thinking you want to have a good time with your family, returning hugs fully, letting Sarah tease you as your sitting in the park, boywatching. Sure, you got along with your parents as John but Mom and Dad, Sarah and you seem to be one of those families that are really tight.....And it's rather nice. In London there aren't any faces and places that remind you that you were John. Thus he disappears a little faster than he might otherwise.

Occasionally, you wonder if it's plot, maybe by your mom's or Sarah. But increasingly your response is, [I]so what if it is?[/i] You all love each other.

Friday, is s special day for you and Sarah. You are going up to Stratford upon Avon for a performance of [I] The Tempest[/I] and then spending the night at a country inn while Dad and Mom stay in London. You spend the afternoon in visiting Shakespeare's daughter's home and eat at a pub named the Black Swan and called the Dirty Duck.

The performance of [I] The Tempest[/I] is brilliant, unlike anything you've ever seen and with all that has changed you can't help but feel like Miranda. That realization hits you and you know you can never be the John you where before. You think you've just decided to become an actress when you grow up. Oh Brave New World indeed with such people in it.

And you hardly notice how quite Sarah is.

That night, in the dark, sharing a bed, she whispers to you.

"Pigeon, you know at the store last week."

"Wha__" you say groggily. You were almost asleep and now your sister wants to talk.

"At the store, see, I kinda made a wish....And I don't know for sure, but it may have affected you somehow."

"What?" your listening now. This might be important.

"I just kinda figured out that I may be, well---Pigeon, I'm a fate witch."

"Sarah,"
112332111212.title: You can wait until after Spring Break. What cou...

1123321112121.content:
"Sarah, it doesn't matter. I'm Jane, your sister, I've always been your sister and that's what I want to be." You give your sister a fierce hug. "And when I grow up I'm going move here, become a Shakespearean actress."

"Only Shakespeare, Pigeon?"

"I might have to do one or two other things to pay the bills, until I get really famous."

Sarah laughs, but you both have tears in your eyes.

"Really?" Your sister asks you again. It seems like she's making sure of something....you get the feeling like you should know. On the other hand you sense you just made an important decision.

"Really." You nod emphatically. Obviously this decision to become an actress must be really important to you.

You both go to sleep, and it is the soundest most comfortable sleep of your life.

And when you wake up in the morning you are utterly Jane Wild, just like you've always been. John never existed.
1123321112121.title: "it doesn't matter."

11233211121211.content:
And Sarah dreams of a odd boy friend, not Teddy her boyfriend she has now. But one she would never have, for the girl she is in the dream is settling for the only life she thinks she can have. In fact, she's really happy this boy is into her. And she's kinda into him because he's the best she's going to get...at least that's what she thinks in that other life.

Anyway, he walking into that store, the one she told Jane not to go into and she's going after him, only he's walking past the children's clothing, something her little sister would wear if she had a little sister, because the girl she was in that dream has no siblings because her dad walked out when she was four. For a moment, she wishes she had a sister.

At that moment the clothing reaches out and touches the boyfriend she was sorta into. She runs to the store.

Then suddenly her sister Jane is right next to her,.....and everything is better. She doesn't know why or how it is better because it's the only life she's ever known. But her life is better and the girl she is is happier, a better student, is with the perfect boy for her who she's planning to lose her virginity to sometime this summer and a great little sister who has just decided to become an actress in the RSC.

In all, it's better than the other her she knew in the dream. After all, she's a fate witch and she can alter reality.

And she wakes up. The clock says 3:08 AM. She looks next to her were Jane is sleeping.

Sarah gets up and walks around the room, just to clear her mind. At the moment she gets to the door, she hears a male voice, kinda Scottish you think.

"Sarah, we need to talk. It's about the nature of reality and your place in the space time continuium."

You, Sarah (Because Jane has lost all notion that she was ever anyone but the little sis you adore and thus just stopped being the main character)---
11233211121211.title: Sarah knows....something

choices: Close the door and do what he says
112332111212111.content:
"You're not going to kill me, are you?"

"Ah, no." He sounds like he hadn't expected that question. "But we really need to talk."

You open the door.

There is a man, looks like he's in his twenties. You look at him for just a second and, pause, you recognize him, even under the make up. He's tall, and thin, and kinda quirky. He played Caliban in last night's performance.

"Can you tell me what a fate witch is and how I know I'm one?"

"The short answer is reality warps around you in certain places and you have no idea to control your powers. You know that because I can also alter reality and I inserted that knowledge a week and a half ago when you were getting your sister out of the store. And right now you need to do exactly what I say."
The man says as quickly as he can get the words out.

"Why?" You ask.

"Because tomorrow, you're going to encounter a store like the one you got your sister out of, and another fate witch is going to use his powers to force a piece of clothing onto you. You're going to change and since your the youngest, least trained and most powerful of us, reality as we know it will shift is a big way based on what you end up wearing."

"Why can't I just not go in?"

"I don't have all the answers, but he's been subtly altering reality to get you into position. He's good at what he does, so he'll find a way to get you to go in."

"And why should I trust you."

"Because I'm really desperate, and I don't think you will like the person you're going to become. And all I want to do is delay that long enough for you to help me fix things."

"So what do you want me to do?"

He hands you a piece of string,,red in color.

"Wrap that around your finger, it will delay you forgetting."

"What you mean."

"It means your little sister used to be your boyfriend, until reality changed and in under two weeks, you both forgot about it."

"But Jane's always been my little sister," you say, seriously. But that dream you had, that no one knows about, backs it up.

"That's also true, but I don't have time to explain now." Suddenly the man is looking around. Then he runs.

You--

113.content:
Rob, 19, was your average college guy: slacker attitude, rule of fun, etc. One day after classes, he was walking home when he saw a new clothing store had opened up. Wanting to put off his homework until later, he decided it would be okay to take a quick look-around.

The store was incredibly large, but Rob stuck to the "college kid" section. While browsing the aisles, he accidentaly brushed against a loose article of clothing. Suddenly, the clothing flew off the shelf & onto Rob's body, replacing his old clothes. Without Rob knowing, his body & mind changed to match the clothing he was now wearing.

What was the clothing?
113.title: Meet Rob

1131.content:
Rob couldn't see what he was wearing, so he ran into a nearby changing room and looked in the mirror. Staring back at him was one of those nerdy people you'd see in 80s movies. Rob freaked out, but then realized it was just a costume. And it was a good one, too. Very detailed as to what an 80s nerd would look like: incredibly high-water plaid pants, a short sleeve button-up, shiny black dress shoes, socks covering half of his calves, a bow tie, a pocket protector filled to the brim, and a pair of large, thick-rimmed glasses. "This would be perfect for Hallo-" Rob said to himself, but stopped. Instead of hearing a deep, puberty-stricken voice, he heard a squeaky squeal. "What the?" Rob thought out loud, but then realized more changes were yet to come. Rob's small belly from overeating disappeared, but also did his muscle from playing on the lacrosse team. In fact, he was incredibly skinny, almost bonelike. His slight tan faded into pasty skin, his teeth grew buck-toothed and braced-up, and his hair became overly greasy & arranged into a hideous combover. He was a nerd, all right. An 80s nerd.

But the changes didn't stop there: his head started to fill with all sorts of knowledge, and his interest in D&D gained a +30 bonus while wielding any D&D object (nerd joke). But the worst part was that he remembered his old self. He remembered Rob, the college slacker. He was a slacker no more.

"I've gotta get back!" Rob yelled, and he thrust out of the changing room, to be greeted by another surprise: he was in the 80s. All the people now had an 80s stlye, and some old hip-hop songs blared out of the store speakers.

"Wait," Rob thought, "if I touch some other clothing, I'll change to that! But these are all 80s clothes... maybe someone can help me!" What should Rob do?
1131.title: Back to the... Past

choices: Rob trusts Elena to help him.
Rob is skeptical of Elena's desire to help him. He searches for another way.
11311.content:
Rob looked around frantically for someone that could help him. He knew he had to hurry, which was against his old nature, but the thought of being stuck in the 80s as a nerd scared him.

A pretty, young lady that looked out of place for any time period, let alone the 80s, overheard Rob's scream from the changing room. She had been looking at candles when the room transformed around her, which didn't bother her. But the guy she had been eyeing had disappeared, and she when she heard the scream she knew, something had happened to him. She turned around to see a nerd emerge from the changing room, the panicked look on his face making it obvious that this nerd was her guy.

Rob took notice of her and was surprised that she was wearing a fancy dress like one a princess would wear. She locked eyes with him. Giggling, she introduced herself, "I'm Elena. Could you perhaps tell me where the young man from the changing room is?" Rob was stunned by her beauty and stuttered, "Um, I'm him." Elena pretended not to believe him, "No, you can't be!" Then she leaned in and spoke softly, "Silly, I know it's you!"

Rob was curious. "How did you know?" he squeaked, the nasal sound of his new voice reminding him of Steve Erkel. "I'm a witch. I know all about this place, that it can transform people. But my protection spell keeps me from being affected so I just pay no attention usually, not till today." This made Rob even more curious. He asked another question, "Why today?" Elena smiled, "Because I like you." "What? You like me!" Rob said, kind of wondering why a girl like her would like a nerd like him. "Not the nerd you, the real you," she continued. He was relieved, "Oh, okay."

Rob wondered if Elena could help him, or was she going to do something else to him. But Elena spoke again, "I can help you get back." "How?" Rob asked. "Simple, like I said, I'm a witch. I'll break the spell on the costume and you'll be back to normal," Elena answered. She thought to herself, "It's a shame to let him go this easy. I should have some fun with him first."

Does Rob trust Elena to help him or does he try to find his way back on his own?
11311.title: Get help

113111.content:
"Please change me back!" Exclaimed Rob. "I don't want to be like this!"

"OK" replied Elena. "Just give me a second." She reached into her handbag and pulled out a old wood wand covered on strange runes and gemstone insets. Closing her eyes, the witch began to chant is a strange language that sounded vaguely like Latin. After a few moments she opened them. "Ahhhh. Very cleaver!" She touched her wand to the tape holding his new glasses together. Rob breathed a sigh of relief as he looked in the mirror and saw a healthy tan spread across his skin and he regained his former mass. In a few moments he was physically back to his old self; however, he kept his new nerdy persona and still wore the costume.

"Umm. Aren't you going to finish?" He asked Elena timidly.

"I am finished." She replied.

"But my clothes? And my....." His voice trailed off as a nerd's trademark elegance when talking to beautiful women kicked in. "I mean uh... You know.. My..." He began to blush.

"Shhhhhhh." Responded Elena in her most seductive voice. She put a finger to his lips. "I like my men to have both brawn and brain. You look good now, but I know how we can make some improvements. Follow me." She lead him around the store finally she found what she was looking for, and after muttering a few short phrases to change it's spell held up a now costume. It was a Letterman Jacket, and the patches on it showed it belonged to a serious Jock.

"Put this on." She told him.

"But won't I-" he stammered.

"Put it on." She repeated, this time more forcefully. Rob complied. Almost as soon and the jacket touched his shoulders the changes began. His slight belly one again melted away, but this time to reveal a well-formed six-pack. His extra fat melted away to be replaced with toned muscle from years of football training. He was now a serious athleat, playing something every season, and captaining most of his teams. Even before his first transformation Rob had never been much of a sports fan, but now he found he knew every rule, play, and technique. The influx of stats he now found he knew about all the latest players helped him to realize that they had progressed back to the modern era. His popularity shot through the roof. But even as his outward confidence rose, the geeky knowledge he had gained from his first change, if anything, grew as well. Sure, he noe knew the entire playbook for his High School team back to back, but his D&D knowledge also modernized to include newer editions and online MMO's such and World of Warcraft. He knew every player in the NFL, but he could also name and label every element on the periodic table. He was one of the rarest, and if discovered, most scorned type of Jock to take the field. I short, he was a closet Nerd.

Ron stared dumbfounded at the woman an new set of memories was telling him had transfered to his college and was his newest girlfriend, not sure what to make of the new life she had created for him. She smiled.

"I'd love to talk be according to my watch your supposed to meet up with your guildmates in ten minutes." She commented in order to break him out of his daze.

"Not so loud here in public!" He yelled as he glanced around to make sure no one had heard. Another batch of memories were telling him how she had discovered his secret how he was dating her to stop he from telling anyone else. Yet he knew she was the witch who caused this in the first place! "It's OK now since no one heard, but don't take risk like that. I'll pick you up at 7, OK?"

"Fine by me." She replied. "Feel fee to send someone my way. I've got some more combinations I want to try." Rob wasn't so sure if he wanted to, but he nodded anyway before he ran off to his car. He was going to have to hurry if he wanted to meet his guildmates in time.

Elena smiled to herself. This was going to be fun!
113111.title: Rob trusts Elena to help him.

I look forward to your decision." Elena turns away from Rob and walks out of the store. Rob looks around at the clothes. He's frustrated, "They're all 80s clothes!" But then Rob realizes that's not a bad thing. He knows a bit about the 80s and maybe if he's stuck here he could take advantage of it.

What does Rob do?

11312.content:
"I wonder what happened to my old clothes?" Rob said to himself as he ran back toward the rack he had been standing by. "Maybe I can use them to change back." He looked at the assortment of outfits. It didn't take long to find the t-shirt and sweatpants he had been wearing previously, but when he reached to grab them they began to shift and change, just as his body had not long before. He watched, transfixed as the shirt faded to white and a row of bright, shiny black buttons materialized and the front. There was a loud rip sound as the front split down the middle and the top swelled as it shifted into a dress collar. The waistline of his paints also ripped off and shifted to a much thicker fabric. It turned bright neon orange and metal clasps formed on the the ends as it became a suspender. Another one came into being besides it to complete the pair, and they clasped onto the pants, which had taken on a nasty plaid print. A couple inches tore off both pant legs. One became a bow tie that matched the pants new look. The other turned to white plastic and became a pocket protector that quickly filled to the brim. The remaining accessories needed to complete the new costume, namely the dress shoes, hideously plaid socks, and thick rimmed glasses taped in the middle, appeared underneath the outfit. The only thing left to hint at what the clothes formerly were was the images of Rob's college mascot, a black panther, which were now printed every inch or so the the suspenders.

Rob stared in shock at what his clothes had become. "We'll, I guess that plan is not going to work." He said to himself. The sound of his new made him shutter with fear. He was stuck like this! "Wait a minuet!" He thought. "I'm not stuck. I can't go back, but I know a little about this time period. It won't be so bad here. I can chose another costume so I won't be stuck as a nerd, and then get situated here. Or maybe I should stay a nerd. Didn't all those 80's shows have to geek end up filthy rich with the football captain mowing his lawn?" He looked at the other costumes along the rack. There was a Letterman Jacket covered in patches that made it clear it was for a Jock, some strange looking black clothes with a neon green wig for a Punk, a popular Cheerleader's outfit, and some a pair of baggie sweatpants and hoodie with a skateboard below, which had to be for a Skater.
11312.title: Epic Fail for Plan A. Plan B?

1132.content:
Suddenly Rob became a bodybuilder. His small belly from too many chips disappeared, instead there was a well-formed six-pack. Every other muscle in his body started to fill out, with the muscle shirt showing off his amazing arms, the workout shorts stretching out against his tree trunk thighs, and the flip-flops showing off his toned feet, if anyone was into that.

Unfortunately, as Rob's muscles grew, his brain shrunk. His IQ was at a pitiful level, and his only reason for being on campus was for his wrestling scholarship. He was an academic "brick", as the term goes.

"Gosh, I still need to do my daily workout," Rob thought to himself, "but this store is pretty cool." What should Rob do?
1132.title: Robbie the Hottie

choices: He likes Robbie's life and decides to keep it.
He goes back to the store and finds the other wrestlers there looking for gear.
11321.content:
Rob, or Robbie as he was now commonly called, paused as he reached to grab the gym bag that had materialized on the ground beside him. Something in the back of his mind was bugging him. Something was wrong. He thought about it for a second, but then brushed it away. He didn't like to think hard, and tried to avoid it as much as he could.

"This store looks pretty cool; I'll have to stop by after my work out. Gotta get to the gym now." Robbie walked out of the store and off to the local gym. He looked forward to his afternoon workout every day. It and wrestling practice were his daily highlights. If only he didn't have to do all the boring class work stuff! As he walked he saw the lacrosse team out starting some preseason practices. He felt the same felling he had felt back at the store. "Did I forget my gym bag again?" He wondered. But no, he had it. Must have been something he ate.

He arrived at the gym. Strangely, he felt a kind of reverse Deja Vu, like this was his first time there, even though he knew he'd been there many times before. Today's workout was fairly easy, and before long Robbie was done. Before he got back into normal clothes he took a moment to admire his body in the changing room mirror. Then it hit him. His body! That was it! There was something wrong with his body. He spent a good five minutes thinking about it, but soon gave up. He was in perfect shape! What could be wrong? His phone whent off. He was late for the Jake's party.

Robbie spent the rest to the night drinking beer, eating pizza, watching sports with the rest of his friends from the wrestling team. Besides him and Jake, a close friend who, while not as muscular as Robbie, always seemed to attract more girls with his baby blue eyes, light brown hair, and good complexion, there was Jamie, a skinny Latino who could nevertheless hold his own on the mat, and Brandon, who fancied himself a lady's man, even if the ladys didn't agree. In the fun of it all,

Robbie completely forgot about the strange feelings he had had that afternoon. He didn't even think about them again until he had got back to his dorm. What had he thought was worng about his body, he wondered as he lazily threw his muscle shirt and gym shorts on the floor. Wait a minute! His body! The gym clothes! That store! It all came rushing back to him. He wasn't Robbie the bodybuilder, he was Rob the slacker! He'd walked in that store an average looking slacker, bumped the clothes, and now look at him! He laid down on the couch and tried to decide what to do.

113311.content:
"Manly Costumes" Read the sign place above the doorway leading into a separate room.

Rob enters as just then a man in his latter years of age pushes past Rob without so much as an excuse me, or saying anything.

Rob enters the next room and finds he is in a foyer room with three doors leading to varied offerings of costumes.

To his far left is a large brown stained door with a sign placed above it and read as "Male Furrier Department."

Another brown stained door directly in front of him had above it a sign what read as, "Male Masculinity Designs."

As to his right was a door painted white, the paint chipped where hands pushed at it to open the door and as had the others it had a sign above the doorway what read as, "Custom Commons."

Rob stood there and wondered what each of the different costume departments had to offer, the furrier one suggested what it might offer, but the other two were each a mystery. As he stood there considering a man walked into the foyer, looked at the three doors and the signs, as then with some haste he entered the center door.

He wished to ask a store clerk and walked to the entrance door he walked through to get inside the foyer find the door as locked, keeping him held inside until he should choose which of the three doors he would enter. Rob stood there as the door opened and in walked a fellow about the same age as was Rob.

"Hey," Rob said as to ask the fellow a question, but the young man just looked at Rob and walked up to the door leading inside the Male Furrier Department and as he entered, held the door open, he turned and looked at Rob. As the the fellow said to Rob, "If you want for more than just a one night fling costume, going in here offers much more fun!"

The door closed and Rob was sure he heard the door lock when it did, as much trapping the fellow inside, or maybe too, there was some exiting door from that department to the outside and the parking lot?

Rob was there to find a costume for a one night stand at a party, he planned never to use the costume again, and thought only to rent one rather than buy something. He stood and eyed the white door, figuring the mass of flaked paint and door chips on it meant that more people went through there to get a costume. Rob walked over to the white door and began to push it open when he heard voices from inside.

"No way lady, you expect me to get dressed in that thing, and what is worse, I cannot rent it, even if I wanted to the prices here are outrageous!"

Hearing that tidbit of news Rob let the white door close as he stood back and began wondering which door he should enter and was buying something an absolute?

Just then enter a man who walked past Rob and then stopped before he would have entered the center door to the Male Masculinity Designs, as he said to Rob, "Is there a waiting line to get inside?"

"No," Rob replied, as then he heard the entrance door the man used to enter the foyer room slipped closed and relocked. "Damn it, I wanted to get out of here, that door is the only way to get out!"

"Get out, you want to get out, I would ask why, this establishment offers a guy so much, that after my last masculinity enhancement wore off I came back for another." Said this very well built manly looking fellow, he smiled at Rob as then turned and walked through the center doorway to that department.

"This is crazy," Rob said to himself as he stood there wondering what next to do.

Wham, and the entrance door opened and in walked a lovely young woman. she saw Rob and offered him a friendly as well seductive sort of smile, as then walked toward the Furrier doorway, as Bob said, "Excuse me, but this was the male costume department, are you mistaken for coming inside here?"

"No deary, I should have come here the first time I came to the store. Then, or it was last year I came here and was talked into trying on a brunet bimbo woman costume that physically changed me from a happy man to a hot dolly. This time I plan to get a change that will help me earn a fair living, the furrier can make me look like a circus freak!" She stated said, and without another word she opened the door to the furrier department and walked inside.

"Weird," Rob said as he scratched the top of his head, his mind in a tailspin of wonderment and worry.

Rob stood and waited, wondering, he then went to the furrier department door and pushed it open, gave a listen to people inside talking.

"This is an excellent choice to help make you look the part of being a circus freak, very few of these the wearers stay anywhere near civilization, they prefer the wilds of the woods, or forest glens. I see you are impressed, if you would prefer to try it on, be sure not to use the Reformation salve supplied in the changing rooms, as use of it makes the costume as quite permanent and an instant sell-buy agreement!" The sales clerk said, as Rob figured the man was talking to the bimbo lady what walked inside there wanting to find the perfect costume to make her become a circus freak.

As then another voice of a different sales clerk said, "Excellent Mister James, I am elated you find that costume to your liking. Indeed, you male masculine figure does well when blended with bovine muscle and black fur makes you look so handsome no cow could ignore you. You signed the proper forms, as everything looks to be authorized by the credit card company. I shall take the liberty of destroying your street clothing and shred your personal credentials and drivers license. As a sudden disappearance causes the authorities to wonder and check and look for a missing person, the trail for your past and identity stopped when you entered my department, thank you for your business!

Oh ah no, Mister James, not that door, but you need exit by way of the livestock chute, as enter the waiting truck as it leaves here within the hour, good luck and i am sure you will enjoy living the lifestyle of a herd sire bull."

1133111121.content:
Rob took the overalls and the plaid white shirt and headed into the changing room to his left.
But as soon as he entered the changing room,the door closed itself behind him.
Panicked, Rob tried to reopen it but to no avail.
after almost a minute of struggling to open the door a women voice came out of nowhere ''sorry,but our doors are one way only mister Rob''
''you can only come out by the door in the back of the room''
''great,what a strange place'' rob wondered while turning himself to see the room he was in.
The room was big and almost looked like a lounge and it was well furnished.there was two red antique couches on each side of the room,
a large round table in the middle and many mirrors with gold ornaments everywhere.
he could easily see a big double door made of what seemed to be metal on the other side of the room.
not thinking twice Rob went to the table and dropped the overalls and the shirt on it and went to the door,hoping it would not be locked.
unfortunately for him,it was.
suddenly,he heard the women voice again ''the metal door can be opened only when the client wear the costume''

in despair,Rob headed to the table and took the overalls.thew were far too big for him. probably not bodybuilder sizes but still way bigger than he was.
the shirt was an XL shirt made for huge person while Rob wore only Medium shirt and most of his shirts were baggy,wearing that thing would be ridiculous
''am i going to wear those overgrown cloth?'' though Rob

the voice started again ''all our cloth are certified to fit anyone,whatever the size,sex and body type of the client''
''so worry not and try them''

Rob though that the best thing for him at the moment was to comply to the clerk demand,and so he started to remove his clothing,starting with his shirt.
he was not skinny but not muscled either,his body was normal in every aspect.
next he took off his jeans,leaving him in his plain dark blue boxer short.
as he grabbed the overalls to wear them the woman started to talk again.

''underwear are included in every human costume, it is requested that the client strip completely before wearing the costume.''

Perplexed,Rob took the overall and searched them and just as the clerk has said there was a bag with a pair of underwear in it attached inside of the overalls.
they were bright red boxer brief,at last two size bigger than Rob used to wear.
Rob looked around himself,wherever he looked he saw no cameras,how the heck did the clerk knew he were going to wear the costume with his own boxer.
brushing his though away,Rob shamefully took down his boxer.
standing naked,he started to open the plastic bag containing the costume's boxers.
they were definitely too big for him,but what else could he does.
he started to put them on,they seemed to be made of spandex,but the feeling was not unpleasant.
with the boxer brief on,Rob looked mostly ridiculous,he had to keep at last one hand on the boxers at all time to keep them from falling off.
but out of nowhere he felt a tingling sensation in his groin,it was as if someone was tickling him and giving him a massage at the same time.
quickly trying to think of another thing he took the shirt,it was a simple cotton white shirt.
without thinking he putted it on,only to realize that while he did,his new boxer didn't fell off.
with the shirt on,he could see how stupid it looked on him,this was definitely too big for him.
as he contemplated himself in one of the many mirrors, the tingling sensation he had in his groin suddenly rose to his chest and arms.
trying his best to not laugh because of the tickle,he decided to put on the overalls.
like the rest of the cloths,the overalls were at last two size bigger than what Rob used to wear,but he felt strangely compelled to wear them anyway.
and so he put them on,securing the strap on his shoulders,looking ridiculous in these overgrown cloths. strangely there were no sock or shoes with the costume.
the tingling followed soon after and soon he felt it on all his body but it suddenly disappeared.
with the cloths finally on him the voice started again.

''Now that you have the proper attire,please continue through the door''

''no need to tell me twice'' Rob though heading to the door, not noticing that his former cloths were gone.
wanting to get out of the store faster he opened the door and almost run through it,only to find himself in another place.
as if the door was magic he found himself in a barn,dumbstruck Rob turned himself to return into the door only to find that it was gone.
not knowing what to do in this new place with his overgrown cloths he heard the same familiar voice again.

''welcome to your new reality,allow yourself a few minute to physically and mentally fit in''
''thank you for shopping in our store and have a good life''

''what??? what do you mean by new reality?
what do you mean by fit in? you hear me? answer me.'' Rob shouted.but no answer came.
he was now alone in a barn with overgrown cloth.
wanting to know where he was he headed toward the door of the barn to take a look outside,at last to know where he was.
but as he walked he felt the tingling came back but this time it was ten time worse.
falling on his knees,laughing like an idiot he felt as if a hundred hands were tickling him and a hundred more where massaging him.
suddenly he felt like if someone was doing him the worst wedgie ever,and as his hands went to his crotch he felt it grow bigger and bigger.
wanting to ease the pain on crotch he planed to take off the overalls but he never could because as he went to the strap on his shoulder he felt his arm and torso grow.
moaning under the pressure of his grow,he realized that he was filling the cloths.hard muscle were developing on him at an incredible speed.
soon enough he had filled the clothing completely,but he was still growing.
in probably a minute he had passed from 120 pound to nearly 220.
but why did the growing didn't stop at the moment he filled them perfectly.

''its normal,those are my old cloths and we are too poor to buy new one'' said a strange but sexy voice in the back of Rob's head.
''what? why did i though that?'' wondered Rob.

before the voice in his head could answer,Rob felt his skin burn and watched aghast as his white skin was slowly turning into a nice tan.

''wait i didn't wanted that when i entered that store'' Rob plaid as his dark brown short hair started to grow longer until it reached his shoulder then turned sandy blond.
giving him the look of a cool surfer

''Ghngn....why?.....who...are....you?'' painfully asked Rob

113322222221121211211111.content:
Alexandra, the oldest and most proper of the three sisters was not the most caring when it came to Rosetta’s rebellious nature. She considered herself a fine and proper lady with hopes of marrying a rich lord and having his children. She loved to live in comfort and couldn’t imagine a life in which she wasn’t waited on hand and foot by servants.

Catherine, the second oldest, was a bit more caring and understanding. While still very proper, she was also a bit more sympathetic towards Rosetta. She found herself
Acting as the peace maker and barrier between the two of them quite often. Her goal was always peace and happiness. She wanted to marry as well to a nice lord, however she cared more about her family image than anything and the less fighting the better it made them look.

“Oh dear lord Rosetta...What have you done now?” Alexandra said as they prepared to enter the ball room.

“Sister! She is injured and we have to show our support!” Did that man touch you dear?” Catherine asked looking at Rosetta’s wound.

“No...it’s fine.” Rosetta said pushing her sisters away. She hated Catherine fake sense of sincerity. She hated Alexandra too but at least she was honest about her feelings.

Rosetta and her family made their entrance into ball a few minutes later after her father was announced. They walked behind him all proper as Rosetta did her best to manage despite the pain in her ankle.

Many of the countries wealthiest and most elegant bachelors were at this ball. Most of them spoiled heirs just like Rosetta’s sisters. Rosetta knew she would get attention from her outfit but she was in no shape to dance right now and much preferred to hide away in a corner somewhere.

Her night had already been terrible and this party only served to make things worse for her.
113322222221121211211111.title: One or Both Sisters are sympathetic or concerne...

Rob decides on a different script
113322222221122.content:
The Script was called “Club Luna.”

It was an old school monster movie taking place in the mid 80s. The story was about a group of young college kids. You had the jock, the stoner, the hot chick, the shy girl, the nerdy guy, and several other minor characters.

The general plot was a group of friends go vacation on a resort way out in the woods call Club Luna. They are renting a super nice cabin and plan to hang out, party, spend time on the lake, etc. However when they arrive they hear reports of recent animal attacks in the area but dismiss it as bear sightings.

At first things seem to be going well until one night they hear a howling at night along with what sounds like screams and gunshots nearby. With no phone access, they decide to investigate the nearby cabin and find a grisly scene...Multiple campers like themselves torn up horrible and even partially eaten....

When they try to get into their car and leave they see a dark shadowy figure near their car that rushes off before they can shine a light on it. They find their scar is full of large claw marks and even stranger...the brakes likes have been cut..:as if the animal knew what it was doing...

When they finally find a phone and call the park ranger he arrives and investigates blaming the scene on a wild bear in the territory. Saying the other camper group attracted it somehow and it acted defensively when they threatened it.

Our group isn’t convinced and want to leave but with their car broken they are forced to wait several days for a mechanic to arrive. In the meantime all they can do is try to enjoy themselves.

That night however the shy girl and stoner guy go off to collect some firewood when they find themselves being stalked by a large beast. They try to run but the nerdy guy is picked off quick as the shy girl tries to run but soon comes face to face with a huge terrifying wolf like creature. However rather than attack her it only sniffs her and when she freaks out the wolf bites her but she manages to escape.

The next morning they find the stoner guy torn to pieces. The group decides to play it safe and huddle inside to protect themselves. However the shy girl has another problem. Her wound has healed perfectly over night but she is notices certain...changes in herself. Her hearing is better, she no longer needs glasses, her sense of smell is incredible. Her body is also slowly changing, getting stronger and even sexier.

The group begins to investigate and finds out that it is a werewolf stalking them. It seems like this time of year is actually their mating season. They chose one person to be their mate and devour everyone else in their way...

Soon after this it’s discovered that the shy girl is the chosen Mate. She can’t hide her changing body anymore and is even starting to develop some wolf like features.

At first her friends want to kill her but soon thanks to the nerdy guy reason prevails and they let her live. They figure if she is his chosen mate they might be able to use her before the next full moon when she will turn fully and begin to hunt them down. They discover if they can kill the werewolf before she turns it will cure her.

They create an elaborate trap to stop the werewolf. When they spring the trap it seems to work at first but something goes wrong later on. The werewolf escapes and begins hunting them down. The jock is taken down first followed by the hot chick a few scenes later. Leaving just the nerd and shy girl.

Together the two of them team up and using his smarts and her enhanced skills to take down the werewolf once and for all. The two of them watch as it turns back into a human and it’s revealed to be the same park ranger they met before. It seems he had been luring in campers to feed off of for some time and now finally the nightmare is over....or is it?

The shy girl isn’t changing back and is still becoming more wolf like by the minute...

That’s when the nerdy guy reveals he is actually a werewolf too! He is actually the one who bit her that night. He had desired her to be his mate all along. He laughs when he tells her there is no cure so it’s best if she just accept herself as his new mate so they can live together.

The shy girl refuses his offer and the two of them soon transform into werewolves and have a huge fight scene. Just when it seems the female wolf is about to lose she sees barely escapes a falling trap as it impales the male werewolf killing him instantly.

The final scene shows our heroine some time later, she is living a life in the raid trying to accept her new life and curse.

Rob read the script and liked it, he hoped to land the role of the nerdy guy as his build called for it.

11332222222211.content:
Rob was excited about the brand new Persona game that had just came out.

He hadn’t played it yet but he had heard about the story and was excited as it was a new take on the Persona formula.

Basically the male protagonist, a young Japanese third year transfer student to a new boarding school gets sucked into the Metaverse one day. However the nature of the Metaverse has changed. The owner of the palace, a twisted and vile man of great wealth and power has the ability to change other things in the meta verse to suit his distorted desires. When our protagonist is captured by the palace owner’s shadows the villain using his twisted power to turn him into the thing he desires most, a beautiful girl...

After being turned into a girl against his will the protagonist still refuses to give up and at that moments awakens to her new persona and uses her power to escape. However something goes wrong with the Metaverse Nav as she escapes...A glitch...Something gets twisted and when the protagonist escapes he is back to reality but still a girl...

This sets the stage for the game as our hero now a girl but start a brand new school year as girl at the new boarding academy. She slowly starts to makes friends and allies who become persona users as well over time as they try to find a way to save people from their distorted desires as well as eventually find a way to return the protagonist back to a boy.

Rob wasn’t sure why they went the whole gender bending route for this new game but he didn’t care. He wanted to dress up as a phantom thief like Joker at the new anime con. As he browsed the outfits he found a nice looking boarding school jacket like they wear in the games. He figured maybe he could start here and go for the student look.
11332222222211.title: A Persona type anime?

113322222222111.content:
The jacket was black, which further reminded Rob of Persona 5 and the new game so perhaps that was what was drawing him to it. He took it off the hanger, giving it a look over.

"Hmm....not had," he hummed to himself. Looks like it's around my size."

Right there, he decided to give the jacket a little try, putting his arms through the sleeves and patting it down a little. The size was actually pretty good, and it was comfortable all things considered. The whole idea was kind of funny though, given Rob had never worn any sort of school uniform in his life, aside from a tiny bit of sports on the side.

"Okay, this feels good," Rob smiled as he looked at the price. "And that looks good too."

At that, Rob thought of what else could work. Some pants would be nice, though maybe he could substitute something for...

""Ugh!" Rob suddenly lurched.

Just now, it felt like the jacket just got tighter or something. Rob looked down, seeing that it was suddenly all buttoned up, something he didn't do as he only did a few buttons before.

"Huh?" he asked. "What the hell?"

He pulled at the jacket, trying not to rip it. However, oddly enough, the jacket wouldn't budge, as if it was latched on to him. Okay, this was actually getting a little irritating.

"Okay, enough with-AHH!"

His words were cut off at him crying out a bit as the jacket suddenly got even snugger and began to glow, slowly getting brighter and brighter until the store was getting harder to see.

"HEY, SOMEBODY HELP!!"

Somehow, his words fell on deaf ears, as the store was disappearing behind the light. Rob was feeling sick to his stomach, his senses overwhelmed by the world spinning around him.

Though, oddly enough, what little of the world he could see beyond the light looked like it was getting brighter, almost looking like something out of an animation, or something like that anyway.

Rob fell to his knees, using one hand on the ground to keep himself up, barely noticing that same hand starting to look different itself.
113322222222111.title: Rob touches the jacket

1133222222221111.content:
Rob woke up in as his head was pounding. The strangest experience he just had as his vision was clearing as he looked up and saw his animated hand in front of him...Wait...Animated hand?

Rob shot out of bed and looked all around him. He was dressed in a plain black t shirt and boxers as he was in some kind of student dorm room. There was a school uniform with a black jacket and white pants hanging up in a closet door nearby.

The problem was everything around him was animated! The entire world including himself was now like an Anime!

He rushed to the mirror and saw himself...or rather this new anime version of himself. He looked younger. Healthier, nicer even. He had semi long black hair that was decently styled. His body was young and fit, he looked around 17 or 18. A perfect Anime protagonist age.

There was even a student ID sitting on the counter top with his picture on it.

It said “ Tsuki Yami” 3rd year, Taiyo Academy.”

Rob was beginning to put the pieces together. He had been sucked into some kind of anime world! Was it a persona style world like the games?

Rob looked out the window and saw a modern version of Tokyo as it was clear he was definitely in some kind of new anime world.

“Okay...don’t freak out. Let’s just play it cool for now.” Rob said to himself.

Rob didn’t know anything about himself in this world. Who was Tsuki Yami? He was struggling to remember details of his old life and world as a strange cloudy haze made it hard to focus on those things right now. Something inside him just to accept this for now and live a normal student life.

Deciding to just go along with it Rob got ready and dressed for the day. He put on his uniform as he looked like a professional student at a prestigious academy.

Taking a deep breath he went outside as saw several other students his age all leaving their dorms. They were all boys about his age dressed in the same outfits. It made sense as this was most likely the boys dorms.

From what Rob could tell the school was a couple blocks away and the students all just walked there from their dorms. The girls dorms was right next door as he saw female students leaving it as all the students were heading in the same direction.

Rob was a little off put by the female students. Their outfits seemed...well...rather provocative for what he assumed was a nice academy. Compared to the boys who wore nice black jackets and slick white pants and black dress shoes.

He noticed the girls were all wearing short black skirts. Most of which only went mid thigh at best. They also wore white button up blouses which seemed designed to show off at least some cleavage. They weren’t even wearing stockings or dress shoes either, they were all wearing black open toed Dress heels.

It was obvious as he walked with a group of students that this was not normal...Many of the girls seemed shy and uncomfortable walking around like this as many of the guy students took notice.

At a crosswalk Rob overheard a couple younger female students complain as they were trying to adjust their skirts and tops. Apparently the tops were rather tight and the buttons would pop open on several girls especially the bustier ones.

“I can’t believe Principal Dobutsu got these new uniforms approved for the female students this year. This is totally degrading!” One female student said.

“I know! He is such an animal! Total perv, it’s like we are in a zoo and just display pieces for him to stare at. If not for his wealth and political connections they never would allow him to get away with this!” Her friend said.

Rob overheard their talk as he walked towards the school. It seemed a really nice place on the outside as he took a deep breath heading in wondering what he should do?

Rob heard a weird beeping noise on his phone as he took it out for a moment. There was a weird pop up on his screen as some kind of app was there. It was some kind of red eye...
1133222222221111.title: Continue

113322222222112.content:
Rob actually saw something else he liked even more. It was a mask, black ninja style mask. Only covering the lower part of the face. He could tell it was for a female by the design. He thought to himself how a sexy female ninja would work great as a persona design.

Looking at the mask he held it up to his face for only a moment before it suddenly latched onto him! It jumped seemingly from his hand onto his face as Rob desperately tried to fight it off!

As he did however his word was growing darker...his environment fading away as a new very colorful and vibrant colorful world began to replace it...

The world looked animated, very much in a high class anime style. Everything even Rob himself looked like an anime character now as the mask still refuses to let go!

Rob was getting dizzy...tired...he could barely move as he felt himself drifting off passing out as darkness overtook him...

12131222221111121.content: Lucy gave herself a hug as she just adored her new form. It was as she was checking herself out that a clerk finally showed up. Lucy yelped as she quickly turned around to see the employee. She was a little taller than Lucy was, with red hair and an average physique 'Enjoying ourselves?" Said the clerk. Lucy's face is beet red, wondering and dreading just how much she saw. "Don't worry, most customers have a similar experience to yours, well that or the clothes just poof onto their person and force them to fill it out." All Lucy could say to that was "What?" the clerk took a sigh and said "Okay its clear you aren't getting it , so here goes; 1, this is a magic costume shop where the costume mold the wearer into the ideal shape for whatever costume they wear 2, because you willingly wore the suit instead of being forced into it like so many of my clientele, guess what, you get to take it off and go back to normal." the clerk twirled her finger in a clearly mocking sort of way "How often have you had to explain all this?" questioned Lucy "Way too often" said the clerk, "You won't believe how many ten- twelve year old boys wonder in here and walk out middle aged housewives." Lucy remembering why she wanted to find an employee asked "how much for this suit, I just have to have it." The clerk suppressed a giggle "You actually wanna pay? "I can't remember the last time someone actually paid instead of running out in a blind panic." Sizing up Lucy, the clerk decided "Y'know what, give me a twenty and you can keep it, darn thing looks way too good on you." Lucy's face beamed in a combination of excitement and disbelief "You're the first guest in ages who hasn't lost their mind just touching one of these costumes so I'll tell ya how this one works. Lucy rushed to her things to break out a pen and paper to write everything the clerk says down "Okay first thing, it takes about an hour to shift between your current body and your real one, in order to change just put on or take off the suit and you'll start to change. Second thing you can slow down changing back by wearing a piece of the suit rather than the whole thing for example if say you want to go out one evening you can change, then take off the suit but keep the boots on, that should give you a few hours of fun." All right lets go back to the front desk and I'll ring you up "Sango." 1231.content:
Chloe wandered home from her work over the cobblestone streets of her hometown. It was looking like a thunderstorm was brewing up, the first thick drops leaving dark circles on the pavement.

"Oh crap, don't do this to me." She pleaded to no-one in particular. Today had started out as any typical late-summer day, but by the time her shift was over, dark clouds were packing together ominously overhead. She wasn't dressed for rain, wearing a simple summer dress and jacket that were more decorative than practical, she had already put on a scarf to ward off the chilly late-September winds of Amsterdam. Readjusting her scarf, she increased her step. Her dress boots were click-clacking on the increasingly slippery cobblestones.

A few moments later the drops were starting to turn into a downpour. She frantically looked around for shelter, and ran into the closest store. On the outside it was a dilapidated building, urgently needing a few splashes of paint, and the inside wasn't much prettier. Row upon row of haphazardly hung clothing racks were stretching all the way to the back of the dimly-lit store. There were no other customers, and a bored looking girl was sitting behind the counter, reading a magazine. Chloe wasn't the kind of girl that usually went browsing through such stores, much preferring to get her clothes online. Se looked outside, it didn't look like the rain was stopping anytime soon.

"Well, now that I'm here anyway, might as well give browsing in real life a try..." She slowly strolled through the isles, hoping the rain would stop soon.

She continued browsing for a while until...

One to check the front of the diaper, the other to check the back. The area for the diaper in specific was quite open, thus implying that this was designed for really thick diapers in mind. Also, it had closed-toed leggings with white on the feet bottoms. Disgusted, Melanie simply put the article of clothing back and continued on her way.
For some bizarre reason, she couldn't get that onesie off her mind. It was an incredibly strange thing, yet it just seemed to call out to her. When Melanie snapped back into reality, she found herself next to the onesie again. As it turns out, she ended up walking in a circle. She looked at the pink bunch of fabric for a minute or two. Not really knowing what she was doing, she grabbed the onesie and took it to the dressing room. When she reached the dressing room, she couldn't help but feel childish. With the door locked, she undressed herself and was soon stripped down to her bra and panties. Looking at her figure, Melanie questioned why she was doing this. She's what most people consider average. She was 5'4" with C, maybe D breasts. Now here she is, about to put on over-sized clothing made for babies. Nobody's going to see me in this, she thought as she slid her feet through the leggings with ease, I'm just going to try it on, look at myself a bit, take it off, and forget this ever happened. Melanie eyed herself in the mirror. As embarrassing as this felt, she did seem pretty cute. 1232122222.title: Surprised by a store associate?

12321222221.content:
Melanie didn't see anything that called out to her. Why would she? These clothes were for younger girls, and she was 26. She was so focused on looking for the women's section that she almost jumped when someone cleared their throat behind her.

"Can I help you find something miss?"

Melanie turned around and saw a store employee had come over. The girl was in her late teens, probably 17. Her brown hair was held back in a plastic clip, and she was wearing a white blouse and tan pants. She stood a few inches shorter than Melanie. Her name tag read Julie. She smiled warmly, but there was a glint in her eye that Melanie interpreted as 'I enjoy sneaking up on customers.'

"Oh, I was just browsing. But this isn't really my section. Could you show me where..." Melanie started to ask for directions to the women's section, but Julie cut her off.

"Are you sure? I think you would look lovely in this." The sales associate pulled out a navy-blue jumper and thrust it at Melanie. The garment was clearly designed for a teenager, not an adult, and Melanie had no interest in it. But the way Julie pushed it at Melanie, she accepted it more out of instinct than anything else. As soon as her fingers brushed the cloth, she felt a chill run through her body.

"Uhhh... no, I don't think so. I think this is a bit too young of a style for me." Melanie held the jumper out for Julie to take back, but the sales associate made no effort to do so.

"Don't be silly. It would be perfect for you. I'll bet it even fits like it was made for you."

"How could it?" Melanie asked. "It isn't even my size."

"It's okay, I won't tell. We girls lie about our sizes all the time," Julie said, giving Melanie a conspiratorial wink. "Here, try it on. If it's not a perfect match, I'll give you 25% off anything in the store."

"Well... I suppose it couldn't hurt to try it on. You said 25%, right?" Melanie said, indecision in her voice.

"Great! The changing room is right this way." Julie said, stepping behind Melanie and putting her hands on her shoulders. Melanie was surprised at the sales girl's lack of personal space, but for some reason said nothing. She found herself sulking in the direction the younger girl wanted. Julie even started pushing Melanie to get her to walk faster, and instead of complaining about the girl's presumption, Melanie nervously picked up her pace through the store to a door in the back wall.

"Here we are, now try this on, and remember, if I'm wrong, the 25% off is yours."

Melanie didn't really want to take this any further, she was already feeling a little weird about the way Julie was treating her. And there was no way this jumper would fit her, it was obvious just holding it next to her. But 25% off was nothing to sneeze at, so Melanie sullenly went into the changing room. She took off her top and skirt, admiring herself in her bra and panties in the mirror for a brief second. She looked good. She was happy with her B cup chest, it was full without being too large, and her body showed the toning resulting from her daily workouts. Then she looked at the girl's garment she was about to try on and frowned. She hadn't even worn something this childish when she was a teenager. Oh well, the sooner she got it on, the sooner she could show it didn't fit and get her discount. Melanie took the jumper off the hanger and slid it over her head. She somehow got tangled up and it took a few seconds for her to reach her arms out the correct holes, and get her head out the top. She pulled the jumper down and looked in the mirror, ready to see the poor fit.

But how did the jumper fit?
12321222221.title: Someone comes to check on Melanie

choices: Yes, for some reason, she likes how young she looks
No, she wants to look like a grown woman
123212222211.content:
Melanie gasped. The jumper fit perfectly. It clung to her body as though it was the perfect size, accentuating her curves just barely. The bottom of the jumper came down to her knees, not her upper thigh like she'd expected, and there were no signs of it stretching to fit her adult sized body. Melanie was so confused she didn't notice that Julie had entered the dressing room behind her.

"See, I told you, it's like it was made just for you." Julie smiled at Melanie in the mirror.

"But that's impossible. It isn't my size."

"Well, maybe you've been wearing the wrong size, because I don't think that could fit any better. Turn around, look at the back."

Melanie was in such a state of shock that she found herself doing what Julie said. She turned around and looked over her shoulder. The sales girl was right, from every side, this jumper fit Melanie like a glove. Maybe this was all some sort of trick. Maybe Julie had pulled out an adult sized item that had been mislabeled. That had to be it. Of course, that didn't explain why an adult would want a design this childish, but Melanie chose not to focus on that for now.

"So, what do you think? Should I ring it up for you?"

Melanie blushed. Even if it did fit, there was no way she was buying this thing.

"No, I don't think so..."

"Wait, don't decide yet! Let me get you a few things to complete the look, then you can decide!" Julie cut in. Melanie was tiring of the girl's hyperactive way of cutting her off, but before she could say anything, Julie darted out the door. Melanie turned back to the mirror. She ran her hands over the jumper, but no matter what movement she made, the jumper fit her perfectly. She could not understand how that was possible. Melanie's thoughts were interrupted by Julie's return. In her arms she had a pair of knee socks and black, patent leather shoes.

"Here, try these on, I just know you'll love how cute you look in them."

Melanie had no desire to wear either of the items, but again found herself unable to assert her own will. It must be the shock of seeing herself fit in a girl's clothes. So without enthusiasm, Melanie put on the socks and shoes. She was not surprised to find they fit her perfectly. Looking at herself in the mirror, she looked even more childish. This outfit wasn't far off from a school girl's outfit.

"What a cutie" Julie said, admiring Melanie in the mirror.

Melanie looks at herself one more time. Is she happy with how she looks?

"Suit yourself" Julie said dejectedly and walked out of the changing room.

'What a little brat' Melanie thought. 'Did she honestly think I was going to wear clothes more suitable for someone her age?' Melanie shook her head. Whatever game that sales woman was playing, she was done being a part of it. It was time to change back into her clothes and get out of here. This whole strange occurrence had taken any desire Melanie had to shop for clothes. She just wanted to get back to her apartment, her boyfriend, and her life.

'Now, where did I put my clothes?' Melanie thought, looking around.

Were Melanie's clothes still there?

Melanie took off the jumper, socks, and shoes and redressed in her top and skirt. But as she looked in the mirror, she was greeted with a shocking discovery. *Her* clothes no longer fit! Her top looked like it was made for someone a few inches taller than her, it hung down to her hips and the fit was all wrong. And her skirt was loose enough that it threatened to fall down at any moment.

"What's going on?!" Melanie screamed. Melanie heard footsteps walking toward the dressing room, followed by Julie poking her head in.
