What does Julie say?
12321222221121.title: Yes, but they no longer fit

123212222211211.content:
"I guess I should tell you... this store is magic" Julie said nonchalantly.

"Magic?! What are you talking about? Magic doesn't exist!"

"Really? Look in the mirror. Do you notice anything different?"

Melanie turned back to the mirror. She looked at herself. Obviously her clothes didn't fit. But once she looked harder, she realized something else. Julie was standing behind her, so she could see her reflection. Before, Melanie had stood a good 4 inches taller than Julie. But now, their reflections were almost the same height, if anything, Julie might be just a hair taller! And Melanie's proportions had changed. Her chest was no longer as full, it looked now to be more of an A cup. Her hips and butt were a little narrower. And her body looked less toned then before. If Melanie didn't know any better, she'd say the girl in the reflection was a teenager!

"What happened to me? I look like I'm your age!"

"That's because you probably are. The clothes in this store are magic. Instead of having to find clothes that fit your size or style, the clothes in the store change you to fit them. If you touch an outfit that is a different style than you wear, you'll find yourself changing to fit that style. It works the same way with age, if you touch a piece of clothing belonging to a certain age group, your body will change to fit that age group. Since the jumper I handed you was meant for a girl my age, by touching it, the magic changed your body to fit."

"That's outrageous!" Melanie yelled, stomping her foot. "I don't believe in magic."

"Well, how do you explain your reflection?"

Melanie looked, but she had no explanation. There was no denying it, she looked like a teenage version of herself.

"Then how do I undo the change?"

"You can't for 24 hours. After that, if you put back on what you were wearing before you changed, you will change back to what you were like before. But if you don't change back after a week, reality will adjust and it will be like you have always been like you are now."

Melanie's head was spinning. She was stuck as a teenager for 24 hours? And if, for some reason, she didn't change back into her old clothes in a week, she'd be stuck growing up all over again? This was madness. But she couldn't deny the proof in front of her eyes. Julie looked down at her feet.

"I'm sorry I tricked you into touching the jumper. I just thought it might be fun to see what would happen. You were going to change based on whatever you touched anyway, I just figured I'd pick for you instead of you doing it without knowing it. But that was wrong, you should have picked whatever you wanted."

"You're right, although I'm not sure that would have been any better. So what do I do now?"

"Well, since I got you into this mess, I'll try to help. You'll need some clothes that fit. You can put back on the outfit from before. You're already stuck like this for 24 hours, so wearing it won't make the time any longer, but it might change you even more to fit what it thinks you should look like. Or you can try running out of here in your current clothes, but I'm not sure how far you'll get."

"I guess I'll go back to the jumper for now" Melanie said. She took off her top and skirt, then blushed at her reflection. Her bra and panties no longer fit as well. Julie looked in the mirror and noticed the problem.

"I bet we have something that fits you, I'll be right back."

Julie returned in a moment with a white cotton bra and plain cotton panties. Melanie was disappointed as she slipped them on. The didn't feel as comfortable as her silk undies she had been wearing, instead they felt like what she wore during her teen years when she just crossed the cusp of womanhood. Which, she supposed, was probably only a few months ago for her body now. She then dressed again in the jumper, socks, and shoes. Now no one would take her for anything but a teenager.

"What do I do now? I can't go home like this. I probably can't even drive without getting pulled over for being too young."

"I know. Why don't you spend the afternoon with me! I'll close up the store, we can go to lunch, shop, and do a girl's day. Who knows, maybe you'll even have a little fun reliving some of your youth?"

Does Melanie agree?

Now she was wearing glossy bright pink lipstick, her cheeks had a pink hue, and her eyes had glittery blue eyeshadow. It was applied in an amount only a teenage girl would think appropriate.

"Oh Melanie, you are the cutest!" Julie said, clapping her hands in punctuation.

As they ate, Melanie found herself enjoying gossiping with Julie about school, boys, celebrities, and all the things she used to talk about in high school. Melanie walked out to see her friend Becca standing there. Becca was 26 years old, the same as Melanie was. She was a little taller, well-dressed, with wavy shoulder-length blonde hair.

"Come on sis, I told mom I'd take you to the mall, but we have to get going."

"What...?" Melanie asked in confusion. She didn't understand. Becca was her friend, but here she was treating her like she was her older sister. What was going on?

"Does she need to pay for anything?" Becca asked Julie, who had walked out behind Melanie.

"Oh, ummm, no. She was just trying on some clothes, but she wasn't quite grown enough to fit them."

"That sounds like you Melanie, always trying to act older than you are. I keep telling you, enjoy being a teen. You'll miss it when you're older. Now come on, we have to get going."

Melanie was so confused by everything happening to her that she meekly allowed Becca to lead her out of the store. After walking out toward the entrance doors for the mall, Melanie finally took some initiative and stopped.

"Becca. It's me, Melanie. Why are you treating me like some kid?" she asked.

"Sorry Melanie, I didn't mean to be so overbearing. We just need to get going so we can pick up Ted."

Melanie brightened when she heard that. Her boyfriend Ted! If anyone could help, it would be him. She got a big smile on her face.

"Now don't you go smiling about Ted like that. How many times do we have to have this conversation sis. Ted is my boyfriend. I know you have a crush on him, but he's 10 years older than you. You really need to find a boy your own age."

Melanie was heartbroken. Whatever craziness was going on, it wasn't bad enough that she had to be sixteen again. Now her best friend was her older sister, and worst of all, her boyfriend was now Becca's boyfriend! Melanie felt on the verge of tears. What did she do?

Melanie decided she was done shopping at this store. She left the dressing room and went to return the jacket to its hanger. But when she went to put it back, she couldn't find the hanger. That was weird. She could have sworn it was right here, but she looked and looked, but couldn't find it. She thought she should ask a store employee. But as she walked up front, her mind grew foggy. She couldn't remember what she was going to do. Melanie looked around. Why was she still in this store? She had decided not to buy anything. She was a few stores away when she realized with a shock that she was still wearing the jean jacket. Had she just walked out with it? Why hadn't anyone stopped her? She was confused, but thought that if she took it back and explained she hadn't realized what she was doing, maybe they wouldn't press charges. She turned around just in time to hear someone whistle at her.

"Nice clothes baby! Hot!"

She looked around. Who had said that? But whoever it was had melted into the crowd of shoppers streaming by. Melanie blushed at the compliment, but wasn't sure why she deserved it. After all, she thought as she looked down, she was only wearing a tank top and skirt with this silly jacket.

But what greeted Melanie's eyes was not what she was expecting. Her clothes were completely different than she remembered. Gone was the tank top and skirt. Now Melanie was wearing a tight black t-shirt that somehow clung tightly to her chest and still managed to show off her taut tummy. The t-shirt had a giant pair of red lips puckering up on the front, but the lips were done in that cheap sparkly material popular back in the 80s. Her plain white skirt had become a quilted red miniskirt that hung just to her knees. On her legs she now wore a pair of knee socks that alternated stripes of neon green, pink, and black, and she was wearing high-healed leather ankle boots.

"What the heck?!" Melanie said out loud. How could she be wearing different clothes? And why were they all straight out of the 80s? Something strange was going on. Could it have to do with this jacket? Things had been weird ever since she tried it on. Melanie started walking back to the store to return it. But did she make it?

Melanie fell to the ground, pulling a black suit jacket and pants down with her.

"Ouch" she muttered, rubbing her butt. She looked around. At least no one saw her fall, she could be thankful for that. She shifted weight to get back up when she caught movement out of the corner of her eye. She turned toward the suit that had fallen with her, only to see the jacket flying up in the air. It was flying right at her!

"What the hell?" she said, scooting backwards on her hands and legs. The jacket zipped over to Melanie, and to her great shock, began trying to slip itself on to her. Melanie fought back in fear and confusion. She tried to move her arms out of the way, but the jacket floated around following her arms. As soon as it had lined up a sleeve opening with one of her arms, it shot to her, forcing her arm down the right sleeve. Melanie grabbed at the jacket, trying to pull it off. This proved to be a mistake, because it brought her other arm close to the other sleeve. The jacket tried forcing her other arm into the sleeve.

Melanie was pulling with all her might, fighting off the jacket when she felt something touch her legs. She looked down in horror to see the pair of paints crawling up to her, slipping her legs into itself. Melanie's distraction proved her undoing in the fight with the jacket, it forced her other arm in the sleeve and clung to her. Melanie no longer paid attention to the jacket, she was too busy reaching down and grabbing the pants. Both her legs were already inside, and the waist had crept up to her knees. She grabbed the waist and tried to pull down, but the pants wouldn't budge. Unfortunately for her, lying down, she couldn't get any leverage. Finally she realized she had to stand up. But as she did so, the pants shot up and pulled themselves all the way up, even over her skirt.

Melanie stood and tried to tug the pants down, but they wouldn't budge. It was like they were glued on. She jumped up and down, pulled, and tried everything, but nothing she could do would move the pants. Then something even stranger happened. She felt movement inside the pants, around her waist. She managed to pull the pants waist out enough to look beneath, and what she saw made no sense. The skirt she had been wearing had vanished! Now the pants just covered underwear. But the underwear wasn't the pair of silk panties she had been wearing, it was a a pair of cotton men's boxers!

Melanie didn't have time to contemplate the bizarre changes before she felt her shirt start to move. As she looked, beneath the jacket her top became a starched white men's shirt, and a tie formed out of nowhere. She felt the fabric of the shirt against her skin and glanced beneath the collar to confirm that she was no longer wearing a bra. It was then she noticed that she no longer felt her hair against her neck and shoulders. Melanie ran to a mirror on a nearby wall and couldn't believe her eyes. Her reflection showed her wearing the men's clothes, but that wasn't all. Her brown hair was now short! Instead of reaching down to her shoulders, it was cut in a traditional men's business style. She had about two inches of hair on top, parted to the side, and the side and back of her hair was buzzed to maybe an inch. Her ears stuck out from her head without any hair to cover them. Melanie also noticed that her jewelery (the earrings and necklace she had been wearing) and all of her makeup were gone.

Melanie screamed out loud. What happened next?
